detailed_reviews.review_text: Celebrated a friend s birthday here and had a great experience! Ambience is beautiful but if you re here at night, try to get an indoor table because there are flies outside which can be very annoying. We were served by Rinesh and his team and they were so accommodating, helping us to move to a table indoors which was air conditioned. Food was really good too - definitely recommend the ribs and wings! (If you are celebrating a birthday here, they will give you a complimentary cake  )
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Deborah, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Rinesh will be highly encouraged by your kind compliments and we hope to welcome you and your friends back again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: AMAZING SERVICE BY AMETA! FOOD WAS GREAT AND THE ATMOSPHERE WAS IMMACULATE! 10/10 WILL RETURN
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Ashton, Thank you for leaving us an amazing review, we will be sure to pass on your compliments to Ameta and we look forward to welcoming you back again real soon too! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Good food and drinks accomodated by very helpful staff. I recommend the outdoor seating, it s great for a relaxed Mediterranean dinner with friends. We ll come back!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Thomas, Thank you for leaving us a kind review. We are glad that you enjoyed your time with us on our breezy al fresco terrace and we cant wait to welcome you and your friends back for more Modern European and Spanish cuisine! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ameta had great service and drinks were amazing
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear TYTxXprinceXx TYT, We will be sure to pass on your compliments to Ameta and we look forward to welcoming you back soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Awesome food and service
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Yvonne, Thank you for leaving us a review. We are glad that you enjoyed our food and service. We would greatly appreciate it if you could write to us at enquiry@thealkaffmansion.sg and share how we could make it a 5 stars experience for you. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Good food and excellent services, esp to Ram! Highly recommended!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Raymond, Glad to hear that you had a great time with us and enjoyed Rams service in particular. Looking forward to welcoming you back again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: We were served by Geri - but really, all staffs are good and hospitable. However the food is so so and the drinks (mojito) was terrible. Ambience is very nice (but there were bugs, given that the forest is just next door) Overall is it nice? Yes. But skip the drinks.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Ryn, Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us and while we are glad that you enjoyed your overall time with us, we truly apologise for your unpleasant experience with our food and mojitos. We strive for regular improvement and we would greatly appreciate if you could contact us at enquiry@thealkaffmansion.sg to share your thoughts regarding our food and drinks in detail. This will facilitate staff improvement and help us to investigate the matter further. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Food was great - highly recommend the chicken wings!! Among the best Ive ever had. Cocktails are really good too, fantastic value at $13 during happy hour. Service was super friendly and attentive, Peter was lovely. Will definitely be back!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Mindy, Great to hear that you enjoyed the food and cocktails, particularly the Honey Paprika Chicken Wings and Happy Hour offerings. We will definitely pass on your kind compliments to Peter and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Been here to celebrate my friends birthday, and we decided to be in outdoor (alfresco dining) to feel more of the nature ambiance and also because we know that we are quiet loud when talking  . We are all impressed in overall experience (in terms of food, drinks (wow) and especially the service). Thank you to Peter and Ranesh? if im not mistaken, I hope I got his name correctly, for taking care of us during the dinner. Everyone who served our table are been appreciated and recognized for the warm service we got. We are looking forward to our next event with you guys. Good Job and Keep up the good work! Will definitely come back and refer to more of our friends.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Andrea, Thank you for your lovely review! Our team will be highly encouraged by your kind words. We look forward to welcoming you back and hosting more of your friends soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Friendly staffs and good surprise for my friends birthday celebration. Thank you TXA! Thanks to staff Vijay as well for helping us with the food and drinks menu!

Celebrate my girlfriends birthday here, excellent service by Ken and Peter! Really took care of us and greatly appreciate the complimentary birthday cake. Steak was excellent and the ambiance was great. Will definitely return again!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Lilstewie, Thank you for celebrating a special occasion with us. Ken and Peter will be highly encouraged by your kind compliments. Looking forward to serving you again. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Thank u Geri for making our dinning experience extremely comfortable
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Sharlene, Its great to hear that you enjoyed Geris service and your overall experience with us! Looking forward to welcoming you again soon. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: I was served by Geri, she was pretty friendly and nice, recommended me good food. Pretty nice experience I had i would say
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Zac, Great to hear that you enjoyed your overall experience with us! We will definitely pass on your compliments to Geri and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Had a great dinner! Food was good! Love the Angus Onglet Steak and Smoked Duck Truffle Carbonara Pasta   Special thanks to Geri and Ram for the cheerful hospitality! Would recommend!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Sufyan, Thrilled to know that you had a great dinner and particularly enjoyed our Angus Onglet Steak and Smoked Duck Truffle Carbonara Pasta! Geri and Ram will be highly encouraged by your kind compliments. Looking forward to welcoming you back soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: We were there on a tuesday evening and the service was extremely great. Staff was friendly especially Geri who served us and will definitely visit again!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Ian, Glad that you had a great evening with us. We will pass on your kind compliments to Geri and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Our family and I celebrated my dad s birthday today. The food and ambience was excellent and we thoroughly enjoyed our time. Ram was also friendly and thoughtful - providing us with excellent service throughout the night.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Malayan, Glad that you had a great overall experience with us. We will pass on your kind compliments to Ram and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: We were really lucky to have Geri keep us company! She s an absolute fantastic waitress, super attentive, great energy and could really see how much she cares!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Anouk, Thank you for your kind compliments! We are really glad that you enjoyed your dining experience with us and your feedback will be highly encouraging to Geri. Looking forward to welcoming you back again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ambience was great. Relatively quiet bar and beautiful lights. Service staff were friendly and approachable at all times.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Brian, We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed our ambience and service. Looking forward to welcoming you back again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: The venue is beautiful. We sat indoors and the vibe was just really relaxed and chilled. Good food, drinks and service. Would recommend their DIY Sangria. Tailor it to suit your taste- brilliant!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Ai Lin, We are glad that you enjoyed your overall experience, in particular our DIY Sangria Punch Bowl. Do visit us again to try out another customisable combination! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: I gave four stars because of the atmosphere and service. The outdoor dining environment is perfect for the cooler weather, and every waiter has a great attitude. In terms of food, I think its pretty average. The most special thing is the fried chicken wings, haha. I recommend everyone to order one. The first cocktail  is also very ordinary, so I don t recommend it here.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Cherry, Thank you for your lovely review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed the ambience and service. However, we would greatly appreciate if you could write to us at enquiry@thealkaffmansion.sg to let us know how we can improve on our cocktails. Looking forward to welcoming you back! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nice surroundings and great atmosphere. I love the chicken wings here and the food is not too bad. Geri was the one that served us and she was great! I will definitely return.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear RacJ, Thank you for your review. We are glad that you enjoyed your experience with us, particularly the Honey Paprika Chicken Wings. We will definitely pass on your compliments to Geri as well. Looking forward to welcoming you back! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nice ambience and great service by Geri & Peter
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Pei Wen, Thank you for sharing your feedback with lovely photos. We are delighted to know that you enjoyed your overall experience with us and we will certainly pass on your kind compliments to Geri and Peter. Looking forward to welcoming you back! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: The alfresco dining outlet is relatively new but quite accomplished in their service standards. The ambience is truly romantic, nestled just beside Alkaff Mansions, making for a great wedding reception venue too. Price is reasonable and the menu spread is compact & crisp. A must visit for couples & families.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Debapriya, Thank you for your lovely feedback! We look forward to welcoming you again with our March monthly specials and offerings. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: The ambience and the food and drinks were great, and great value - but want to especially compliment the staff on their service. Geri looked after our group through the evening and was great - super helpful, cheerful and provided consistently great service. We will be back!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Aniruddha, Thank you for leaving us a review. We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed your overall experience with us and we will certainly pass on your kind compliments to Geri. Looking forward to welcoming you back with our March offerings! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Perfect place for a laid back evening. Decent food  as well.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Kaihui, We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed your overall experience with us. Do drop by again soon for our Happy Hour offerings! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: We had a lovely evening at the outdoor seating area. The staff esp Geri were super enthusiastic and helpful with recommendations.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Clara, Thank you for your feedback, we are thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us on our al fresco terrace and we will certainly pass on your compliments to Geri. Looking forward to welcoming you back again really soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Served by Geri, very passionate and warm till the very last order! Great job! Warm ambience and windy place for chilling.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guoliang, Glad you enjoyed Geris service and your overall experience on our al fresco terrace. Looking forward to serving you again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great ambience, amazing service. Food tasted really good as well!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Marcus, We are glad that you enjoyed the ambience, service and food at TXA. Do drop by to try our exciting upcoming offerings soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Celebrated Valentines Day here. Ambience was great and service by Peter and Geri was exceptional. We thoroughly enjoyed the whole dining experience.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear DYPH, Thank you for leaving us a review. We are thrilled to know that you had a wonderful Valentines experience with us and we will pass on your kind compliments to Peter and Geri. Looking forward to serving you again. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: The place is quiet and nice. Suitable for 2pax or gathering with friends. Having outdoor and indoor seating. Very friendly staff. The food is good. Reasonable price. Do order they drink. Very nice. Will surely come back again.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Lynne, Glad that you enjoyed your overall experience with us. Do try our DIY Sangria Punch Bowl during your next visit. Looking forward to welcoming you back again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Alkaff Mansion is a beautiful place, with lovely staff. Had a delightful evening for the V Day package but the food was pretty meh, especially for the price of $148++. The I had the beef which the doneness was all over the place and the cod, which was terribly dry and did not match the description on the menu at all. In spite of that, their punch was delicious and I would enjoy that again, and the lighting and decor was spectacular. I wouldnt say it was disappointing as the staff really made us feel special.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Firdaus, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. While you enjoyed our service, ambience and Drunk in Love Punch Bowl, we would like to extend our sincere regret for the food quality. We will certainly be taking this opportunity to investigate further to avoid similar experiences moving forward. Please rest assured that your feedback is taken seriously and will be addressed within our team. Nonetheless, we look forward to welcoming you back again. Do drop by to try our DIY Sangria Punch Bowl soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Weve had a very nice evening here on Valentines day. Especially staff Geri was super friendly and attentive and ensured we have an enjoyable time. Food was very good and outdoor scenery is very nice. Special quiet place in Singapore   Thanks!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Achim, Thank you for leaving us a review. We are thrilled to know that you had an enjoyable overall experience with us and we certainly look forward to welcoming you back again for our upcoming offerings. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Food is underwhelming. Its a bit disappointing that Txa is selling themselves as a Pintxo restaurant but the Pintxo section is only a small subset of their whole menu (only 7 Pintxo items). I was expecting more. Its also a bit odd that they serve burgers, pasta and pizza (we didnt try these). I see the pdf menu file says Reduced - hopefully they can bring the original menu as intended. The restaurants vibe is a bit odd as well and it did not say Pintxos restaurant. Maybe im nitpicking but even the music is a bit out of place - party/club music. The bar in the middle of the restaurant was also out of place. I guess the intention was to have the spread of Pintxos on the bar but given COVID situation, its not really ideal to have it there. Service was ok. We didnt experience any delays on the food. It was just unfortunate that the servers dropped and broke a lot of things (e.g. plates, cups) that day.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Marvin, Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us and we truly apologise for your unpleasant experience. We would greatly appreciate if you could contact us at enquiry@thealkaffmansion.sg to share your experience in detail. This will facilitate staff improvement and help us to investigate the matter further. Kind regards, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great food with good service by Ram and other friendly staffs as well. Thanks for the anniversary surprise cake! Truly enjoyed the dinner. Will be back again!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Rebecca, Thank you for leaving us a review. We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed your time with us and Happy Anniversary once again! Looking forward to serving you again real soon. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: The ambience is very good. The restaurant is located in the heart of the greeneries. Ham croquettes and chicken wings were good. However, Im VERY disappointed with the angus steak. I ordered well done and the steak I got is still pinkish with blood on it. You can see the photo attached. Not to mention how rough the meat is. We couldnt chew and were not able to finish the plate (very rare for me). This is probably one of the worst steaks I had so far. For sure wont come back again.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Phitchaya Trakulchokchai, Thank you for sharing your feedback with us and for attaching photos. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us and while we are glad that you enjoyed our other food, we truly apologise for your unpleasant experience with the steak. For your preferred doneness, do reach out to our staff on the spot to send your steak back to the kitchen for additional cooking. We strive for regular improvement and we would greatly appreciate if you could contact us at enquiry@thealkaffmansion.sg to share your experience in detail. This will facilitate staff improvement and help us to investigate the matter further. Looking forward to welcoming you back should you opt to dine with us again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: We were served by Allaine. Perfect place for a dinner, outdoor alfresco dining. Food is yummy, ambience is great, service is excellent and reasonable pricing   they even prepared a complimentary cake for our anniversary! would highly recommend!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Neo Wei, Great to hear that you had a superb overall experience with us! We will definitely pass on your kind compliments to Allaine and we hope to welcome you back again for Valentines! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: My party of 7 could not have asked for a better server than sweet and attentive Geri who went all the way out to take perfect shots for us. It was indeed a night to remember with the great ambience and food.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Jasmine, We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your overall experience and we will certainly let Geri know of your kind compliments. Do drop by again soon for Happy Hour! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: We had a very enjoyable time at TXA Gastrobar tonight. We were served by Allaine and Geri. Service was impeccable and we would like to specially mention that Geri was really attentive and sincere in her service. Ambience was great with delicious food served promptly. Will certainly visit again. Thank you for the amazing evening! What a great way to kickstart the weekend!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Sarah, Thank you for your amazing feedback. We will be sure to pass on your kind compliments to Allaine and Geri. Looking forward to welcoming you again soon, do come by to try our February monthly specials and Happy Hour! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Happy place! Good music and decent food. And excellent service from staff :)
The food,service and ambience was amazing! Shout out to Ram and Geri for the outstanding service! It has made out anniversary a wonderful one!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Kenneth, Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled that you had a great time with us and we will definitely pass on your kind compliments to Ram and Geri. Looking forward to serving you again, do drop by for our upcoming Valentines set dinner! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Homely food on a hit & miss chance of being OKish. Service below minimum. Ask me whether I want another glass, chances are near 100% I will say yes. Here you beg for the waiters to bring your opening order.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Kai, Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us and we truly apologise for your unpleasant experience. We strive for regular improvement and we would greatly appreciate if you could contact us at enquiry@thealkaffmansion.sg to share your experience in detail. This will facilitate staff improvement and help us to investigate the matter further. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Was sitting outdoor and the ambience is great! Food and drinks are nice and affordable, and mostly important the service was excellent! Highly recommended for chilling out with friends or a romantic night with loved one. Tried Wildseed for brunch, TXA for dinner.. and cant wait to try out UNA next!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Cindy, Thank you for your kind feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back again and feel free to dine at our sister concept, UNA, soon as well. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Fantastic service. Was seated at the alfresco area but it started pouring. We were given new seats and was asked if we wanted fresh plates. Great service by Ram and rest of the staff!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Rusty, Thank you for your kind feedback. We will pass on your compliments to Ram and the team. Looking forward to welcoming you back again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: We hiked here to have dinner from Kent Ridge Park. The ambience is really great with nice music. The staffs are friendly and attempted to our needs readily. We were thrilled that happy hours is till 9pm Monday to Thursday. We ordered the monthly special Spanish omelette, 2 mains - Vongole pasta & Grill octopus, Burnt cheese cake and drinks. We are satisfied with all our orders and plan to patronise again with more people next week.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Jia Xing, We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed our food, ambience and service entirely. Do drop by to try more of our monthly specials. Looking forward to welcoming you and more friends back again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: My boyfriend suggested this place for my birthday celebration and it was so lovely!! It was really quiet and empty (as it was a weekday) so we nearly had the whole place to ourselves. The service especially was excellent - special thanks to Geri who was really enthusiastic and helpful. The staff also gave me a complimentary birthday cake (which was delicious). 10/10 would recommend! Thank you txa for making my birthday so memorable! :-)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Leah, Happy Birthday once again! Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We are glad to know that you had a fabulous celebration with us. Do come by again to try our monthly specials and Happy Hour offerings soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great cosy area that is perfect for a night out with your loved ones. The lights and ambience sets the perfect mood for any night. Food and drinks are great. I would like to give a special shout out to Ram who catered to us on our special night out. I would definitely recommend this place to my friends and would consider coming back again!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Mala, Great to hear that you enjoyed yourself thoroughly during your recent visit. We will be sure to pass on your kind compliments to Ram, looking forward to welcoming you back! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: The place is nice and cozy     . Thank you RAM for good service
Thanks RAM!!!! VERY VERY GOOD SERVICE!!!!

Had a wonderful dinner yesterday where I brought my girlfriend our for her birthday date. The ambience was extremely scenic and it was highly romantic. Food was also really delicious I particularly enjoyed the truffle duck pasta and La casa grande. The service was the real highlight of the evening, really enjoyed the hospitable service provided by the two young staff that mainly attended to us, unfortunately I only could get the name of one of them, Geri. She was really attentive and highly energetic, it made me feel like she genuinely enjoyed her work and I felt very comfortable. The manager also provided us with a free cheesecake for my girlfriend s birthday and that was greatly appreciated. Would definitely come again!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Matt, Great to hear that you and your girlfriend had a pleasant experience and particularly enjoyed the Smoked Duck Truffle Carbonara Pasta and La Casa Grande cocktail. We will also be sure to pass on your kind compliments to Geri and the team. Do visit us again to try our monthly specials and more! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love the atmosphere. Open air, big space and it helps that the weather is fantastic . Geri gave us amazing service. Her attitude is 2nd to none. Look for Geri if you come.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Kenneth, We are glad to know that you enjoyed your time with us and we will definitely pass on your compliments to Geri. Looking forward to serving you again soon. Do drop by to try our monthly specials! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: We were here for hubbys birthday celebrations. Service from RAM is great and helpful. Friendly and cheerful at all times. Food is great too. Though the lobster was slightly undone, the rest of the food are delicious.  Will be coming again soon.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Lena, We are thrilled to know that you had a fantastic time with us and we will definitely pass on your compliments to Ram. Looking forward to welcoming you back again really soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Service was great, ambience was nice and the staffs gave genuine recommendations on what food to try as it was our first time there. They even treated our friend to some shots and a slice of burnt cheesecake as it was our friend s birthday and also sang birthday song along with us. Would definitely recommend this place for a good casual dinner sesh.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Stephanie, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are thrilled to know that you had an enjoyable experience with us and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Comfy place to chill and dine!
lovely ambience, good food and service. reasonable prices. enjoyed the time there.

Our family had a lovely Christmas Eve dinner. Great food, nice ambience and excellent service. The night was made even more memorable as we were served by friendly Ken who went the extra mile to take beautiful family photos for us and even surprised with a slice of cheese cake!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear John, We are thrilled to know that you had a great Christmas Eve dinner with us and we will be sure to pass on your compliments to Ken. Looking forward to having you dine with us again! Cheers, John

detailed_reviews.review_text: Good food and nice place at this place! Very friendly staff as well. Ram was very nice to check in on us with our food and even gave my friends that got engaged cakes to celebrate ! Allaine was also very awesome in her service. Great staff great place.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Jonathan, Thank you for your compliments. It was a pleasure to serve your table and we look forward to welcoming you all back again soon. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Good ambience and servers, especially Ram, were very professional and fast. Food was served promptly and piping hot.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Kutsu, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your overall experience with us and we will be sure to let Ram know of your compliments. Do drop by for our Happy Hour promotion and upcoming NYE offerings! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very nice ambience. The food is good. I love the squid where it preserved the bake seafood taste and smell. The staff are friendly. I even had my complimentary cheese cake. Recommended.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear GOH, Thank you for your feedback. It is great to know that you thoroughly enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Peter the manager was really nice and the entire experience was superb! Steak and Calamari are must-orders. Would totally come back again
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Jasmine, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are glad to know that you had a pleasant overall experience with us and we will be sure to pass on your compliments to Peter. Looking forward to welcoming you back soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Lovely ambience, the colonial era mansion is very atmospheric. Loved the service, from the petite lady in black polo tee who served us food inside to the Malay gentleman in maroon shirt and Indian gentleman in black polo tee who served us drinks. They were attentive and friendly. The food was good. We had the smoked duck truffle carbonara pasta and angus onglet steak. The dishes were reasonably priced, considering the overall ambience of the place. The outdoor area makes for the perfect spot to chill over some drinks and empty banter.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mahathir, We are glad that you had a great overall experience and particularly enjoyed the Smoked Duck Truffle Carbonara and Angus Onglet Steak. Looking forward to welcoming you back again soon for Christmas! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very cosy place, great ambience! The staffs are very friendly and professionals. Kudos to Elaine!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Rhea, Thank you for your feedback. We will be sure to pass on your compliments to Elaine. Looking forward to welcoming you back soon, with our festive offerings! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Disappointing experience at TXA gastrobar dinner service. We had some questions about the food items on the menu while we were ordering. The waiter attending to us mentioned he is from the restaurant UNA upstairs and he was just helping out at TXA. He claimed doesn t know the menu at TXA hence he was unable to answer our queries. We were hoping he would direct his colleague who knows the menu to us but all we got was a blank stare and an awkward silence. So awkward that we decided not to pursue it, give the benefit of the doubt and just order the food. (Food turned out so so, average) The food we ordered was meant for sharing and every time a stack of plates with cutlery were placed on our table. Not once did any staff took the initiative to lay the plates and cutlery out for us, it was always just a stack laid out at the corner of the table. The table was very unstable as well. It is hard to enjoy a meal while trying to balance the table and hope nothing falls off. Unless the management works on staff training and investing in sturdier dining tables for patrons, not worth a visit there.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Bryan, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us and we greatly value your honest feedback. As our staff were engaged with other tables, a staff member from UNA s team noticed your table and attended to you in the meantime. We sincerely apologise that he was not able to provide menu recommendations due to his designation at UNA. Additionally, we hope that your dining experience was made a little better after our staff replaced the shaky table. Please rest assured that we have conveyed your feedback to our team and once again, we would like to extend our sincere regret that we were unable to provide you the best possible experience at TXA. We truly hope to have the opportunity to provide you a better experience next time should you choose to dine with us again. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Me and my friend chance upon the Alkaff Mansion on our walk. We ordered pasta, steak   curly fries   churros and orange juice. The food was great, the staff were very attentive and easy going, the atmosphere was relax.  The place itself was magical, a private place where you can chillax. It s a good place to have drinks and eat and just be cool  . We will come back with more friends and family. Meow!!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Lucy, Thank you for your kind compliments. We are pleased to know that you enjoyed the food, ambience and service. Looking forward to welcoming you back again soon with our upcoming festive offerings! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great exp. We did our 10th Anniversary dinner and drinks. Service and food both Amazing
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Soumik, Thank you for your kind compliments. It was our pleasure to serve you and we look forward to welcoming you back again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Excellent food and service :) loved the vibe there~
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Yiying, Thank you for your kind compliments. Looking forward to welcoming you back again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great service, great staff, good ambiance and good music. Who could have ask for a more perfect place to chill and relax.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Benny, Thank you for your compliments. We are thrilled to read that you thoroughly enjoyed yourself and we look forward to having you back again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nice, chill spot for some casual tapas. Excellent service.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Kelly, Thank you for your feedback. We are delighted to know that you had a lovely experience with us, looking forward to welcoming you back again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: The smoked duck carbonara pasta and honey wings were really good! Ram s service was really good and he attended to us very fast even though we were seated at a secluded area!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Junting, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We are really encouraged by your pleasant overall experience and happy to know that you particularly enjoyed the Smoked Duck Truffle Carbonara Pasta and Honey Paprika Wings. Looking forward to welcoming you back again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: My hubby bought me here to celebrate our wedding anniversary. Nice atmosphere and cosy place. Perfect for relax romantic dinner set all the good mood. Food is delicious. The staff are all extremely professional and friendly. We were about to leave after the bill when the staff comes with complementary cheese cake with candle wish us happy anniversary. So Touch! Special Thanks to Ken, he is super nice and friendly. Knowing is our anniversary, he even put so much effort help us take a few nice photos around the mansions. Thumbs up to Ken! We will definitely come back again soon and recommend this place to our friends!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Yuliana, Thank you for your kind feedback. It is our pleasure to serve you on such a joyous occasion! We are glad that you enjoyed your overall experience and we will definitely pass on your compliments to Ken. Looking forward to welcoming you back soon, do drop by to try our DIY sangria punch bowl with your husband and friends! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Beautiful ambience and great service!
5-star service and food in TXA. Went to celebrate a friend s birthday and we enjoyed the great service and food. Would recommend to others.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear David, Thank you for your generous rating and compliments. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your experience with us. Do drop by for Happy Hour, looking forward to serving you again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Came here for a birthday dinner and was served by the waiter ram , he was really professional and also had a sense of humour and he even sang a birthday song for me.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Bryan, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your experience and we will definitely pass your compliments to Ram. Looking forward to serving you again soon and happy birthday to you once again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Enjoyed the chill ambience and the food was well done - especially loved the fried Pradon peppers, ham croquettes and vongole aglio olio (al dente and so tasty). Service was quick and earnest - in particular, Ken was attentive throughout without being intrusive. Will return
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Catherine, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed the food and your overall experience with us. We will be sure to pass on your compliments to Ken too. Do drop by again soon for Happy Hour or our upcoming Weekend on Fire live bbq! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: I went Txa Pinto Bar on Saturday for the Halloween Theme Dinner and it was definitely a brilliant idea! Everything there was on point! Amazing ambiance, the food and drinks were quality and the service by the staffs were excellent! Special shout-out to the bartender for the Halloween cocktail because it was one of the best cocktail I ve had so can consider putting it in the regular menu hahah.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Khaeruddin Amat, Thank you for your kind feedback, were happy to know that you enjoyed your time with us and well be sure to share your compliments with our staff. Do drop by to chill out with us and try our all-new customisable DIY sangria punch bowl. Looking forward to serving you again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great place to chill and enjoy the beautiful British colonial mansion during the Halloween night. Excellent service and great choices of drinks in the manu. We would definitely come back again.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Stephie, Thank you for your kind feedback, were happy to know that you enjoyed your time with us and well be sure to share your compliments with our staff. Do drop by to chill out with us and try our all-new customisable DIY sangria punch bowl. Looking forward to serving you again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Had a wonderful birthday dinner here. Food was great and loved the service from Ram. Would definitely come again!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Yun Sheng, Thank you for your kind feedback, wed be sure to share your compliments with Ram. Looking forward to serving you again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Excellent service and atmosphere! Ram elevated our dining experience by his warm service :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Dillon, Thank you for your kind feedback, wed be sure to share your compliments with Ram. Looking forward to serving you again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Service was great (served by Ram)! Food was amazing. Overall had an amazing dinner.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Draco, Thank you for your kind feedback, wed be sure to share your compliments with Ram. Looking forward to serving you again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is truly a gem in Singapore. Was here with family  on Sunday. Drinks - All of us had preferences on our drinks and the bartenders personally attended to us and made excellent drinks. The 2 cocktails I had here were better than some of the best cocktail bars in Singapore. Food - We had the Chicken wings , Mushroom Croquettes and Truffle pizza. All dishes were great. Service - 10/10 for service. Right from when we arrived to the time we left we felt fully taken care of. Ambience is the best highlight. This is also a pet friendly place and my puppy loved being here. Will come by again. Thanks for a great evening.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Ms Maya, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your experience with us and we are so heartened to hear that the cocktails you had surpassed some of the best bars! We look forward to serving you and your fur kid again soon. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nice chill out place with friends during the night! They have Fridays on fire live bbq menu! Try it!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Edwin, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your experience with us. Do drop by for our Happy Hour offerings every Tuesdays to Thursdays and we look forward to serving you at our Fridays on Fire bbq again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Good food, great service by Fhil.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Suthen, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your experience with us. Will extend the compliments to Fhil too! Looking forward to serving you again soon. Do drop by for our Happy Hour offerings every Tuesdays to Thursdays. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Food is okayish, but comes in large portion. Ambience is good too.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Credible Blogger, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your experience with us. Looking forward to serving you again soon! Do drop by for our Happy Hour offerings every Tuesdays to Thursdays. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: We were there on a Saturday evening to celebrate my husband birthday. The atmosphere was really good, nice music in the background, temperature was just right even for outdoor, with a little breeze now and then. We had a few tapas and bar snacks to start with. Love the presentation of each dish. Honey paprika wings were the unexpected highlight!! Full of umami flavors from roasted sesame & seaweed. Finger licking good We were also impressed by the beef short rib dish, having literally melt-in-your-mouth kind of texture, going so well with the dipping sauce on the side. I would recommend to go with truffle mushroom for the pizza, forget the prawn & scallop as it was quite bland.. at least the truffle cream was satisfying with every bite. Overall, a very nice & cosy place for family & friends gathering, even a romantic date would be appropriate. Price wise, not cheap but reasonable I would say! Not forgetting to mention, their service crews were really well trained. Thumbs up.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Jeanna, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your experience with us and you really enjoyed the food, ambience, and music. Looking forward to serving you again soon! Do drop by for our Happy Hour promotions every Tuesdays to Thursdays. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Service was really slow at the start - we had to wait for almost 30 minutes each (at least, that was how long it felt) for the menu, some ice water, and they got our orders wrong a couple of times too. It felt like the floor crew did not communicate with one another. Food was first served without any cutleries as well. But the food was delicious so it made up for the lack in service. Then Ram (I hope I got his name right) started serving us and he completely changed the service game thereon. He was attentive, friendly, and patient. If it was not for him, we would not have left the place feeling like we had a good time. Thanks Ram!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Herman, Thank you for your feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed the food and awesome service from Ram. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us and we will look into improving our processes. Looking forward to serving you again soon! Do drop by for our Happy Hour promotions every Tuesdays to Thursdays. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Food was awesome. Service was top-notch. Ram was really helpful and attentive! Recommended!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Jeanna, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your experience with us and will extend the compliments to Ram. Looking forward to serving you again soon! Do drop by for our Happy Hour promotions every Tuesdays to Thursdays. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Stunning location, one of the prettiest outdoors restaurants I have seen, in a lush park and on the side of the Alkaff Mansion building that TXA and a few other venues are part of, which is a really pretty building. Great ambiance too, due to nicely set up lighting. Food was very good although in itself nothing to rave about. Good selection of pintxos and other small dishes as well as bigger mains. Nicely done and presented. Staff nice, attentive and flexible. Was sometimes hard to grab their attention as the space is quite big and we were sat at the end of the terrace, which meant that we had to keep trying, but when they did see us they were great.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Nikos, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your experience with us. Looking forward to serving you again soon! Do drop by for our Happy Hour offerings every Tuesday to Thursday. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Went TXA Pintxo Bar for dinner. Nice ambience and the waiter (Ram) was very friendly and his service was excellent! Would give him a commendation letter for sure. Definitely will visit this place again
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Eric, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your experience with us and we will be sure to pass on your compliments to Ram. Looking forward to serving you again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Good food Good atmosphere Friendly staff
Great service from Ram and Ken ! Food was delicious and nice ambience . Would definitely return !
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Harvinder, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your experience with us and we will be sure to pass on your compliments to Ram and Ken. Looking forward to serving you again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: This place is great. Located outside a mansion, it is magical at night. Lots of twinkly lights, nice little tables create a wonderful ambiance for fun or romance. Great drinks and awesome food, cant wait to go back.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Melissa, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your experience with us. Looking forward to serving you again soon! Do drop by for our Happy Hour offerings every Tuesday to Thursday. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Really enjoyed the food, ambience and the service. Ram is really helpful and kind in helping to prepare the birthday surprise
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ivon, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your experience with us and we will be sure to pass on your compliments to Ram. Looking forward to serving you again soon! Do drop by for our Happy Hour offerings every Tuesday to Thursday. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Excellent evening, great service, good food and an all round top experience.  Thank you.

Came by yesterday evening and I must say the ambience is great. Love the fact that I was surrounded by nature. Service staff were friendly and accommodating to my requests. Food was good and reasonably priced. Great place to hang out with the buddies! Will surely visit again! Keep up the great work guys!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Reuben, Thank your for your kind compliments. We are very pleased to know that you enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to serving you again soon! Do drop by for our Happy Hour offerings every Tuesday to Thursday. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Amazing experience at TXA. Good ambience and service. Chris has constantly make sure that we are having a good time and provide timely top up of our alcohol. Definitely will return. Thanks.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Wayne, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your time and experience with us and we will be sure to pass on your compliments to Chris. Looking forward to serving you again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: 5stars for service and ambience !!!

Dropped by on a Friday night to have a chill session with my partner. Despite it being full , we were able to get a table after about 10mins of wait. Ordered the chili crab pasta and smoked pork pizza together with some cocktails and everything tasted good! We were well taken care of by 2 of their staff ( ken and ram)! The outdoor area was a good place to sit and chill . Would definitely make a trip down again !
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Randall, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are delighted to know that you had a pleasant experience with us and especially enjoyed the Soft Shell Chilli Crab Linguine and Smoked Pork Pizza. Do drop by to try the rest of our menu and drinks soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Decided to pop by with my partner on Friday night for TGIF and was told by the concierge that it was full but we were lucky to get a table after waiting for a while We ordered the chilli crab pasta, smoked pork pizza and some cocktails to go with it. It was delicious and the cocktails were good too! We sat outdoor and was well taken care of by the entire team!  shout out to Ram and Ken for their good service! The entire vibe was good  and it was fantastic place to chill and end the weekdays, away from the crowd. Would definitely make a trip down again !
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Khaixin, Thank you for kind feedback. Customer satisfaction is important to us and we are really glad to know that our team managed to assist you with a table at short notice. Looking forward to serving you again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: It s a beautiful location surrounded by nature.I liked the presentation of the food and food itself was great too.We had a table outside and felt so spacious and cozy. All the service staff were very attentive and polite, but especially the woman with cool hair (I am sorry, we asked but I forgot her name) was outstanding. We asked her if they are selling cigarettes at the restaurant and they said didn t sell, then unexpectedly she offered her own cigarette to us. We didn t take whole packet, but this kind of unexpected hospitality and kindness made us our day. Highly recommend.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Ayaka, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your time and experience with us and we will be sure to pass on your compliments to Chris. Looking forward to serving you again! Kind regards, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Lovely alfresco setting with friendly, helpful service. They even provide extra table top light for those who need reading light for menu. We had sauteed mushroom with sous vide egg (recommended!), grilled padron peppers & paprika chicken wings. The happy hour drinks at 2 for 1 was a good deal. The burnt cheesecake was good though it was more of a soft cotton texture rather than gooey center. Churros was crunchy outside and fluffy inside. Mains were all good value below $30. Overall, very pleasant outdoors, with big fan and distance from other tables. Will visit again.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Nicole, Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your experience with us and we look forward to serving you again soon! Kind regards, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Pleasant & chill ambience with variety of yummy food! The soft shell crab pasta had the right spice level & the sauce was tasty! The chicken wings were crispy & flavourful as well! Well nestled in a hilltop at Mt Faber Park, this cosy bar is a great place for gathering & a peaceful catch-up!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Jie Yin, Thank you for your kind words. We are heartened to know that you enjoyed your experience with us and we look forward to serving you again soon! Kind regards, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Came here to celebrate my birthday on a Sunday night and I had so much fun! Big thanks to service staff, their service was exceptional and the ambiance is amazing too, would highly recommend for you to come at night. And of course the food, omg I loveee the croquettes, hands down the softest croquettes Ive ever had. The basque cheesecake is really good too, its really rich and soft at the same time. Cant wait to come back again!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Annabel, Thank you for your kind compliments. We are very pleased to know that you enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to serving you again soon! Kind regards, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Had an amazing quiet night there. It just rained so were sat outside, but it started to drizzle and the waiter was really accommodating in bringing us in and carrying our plates. curly fries with truffle mayo tasted really authentic not like some places where the truffle smell is overpowering. We had the beef steak for mains and it was cooked to perfection. Decor and ambience was tastefully done, as well.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Deryk, Thank you for your kind compliments. We are very pleased to know that you enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to serving you again soon! Kind regards, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Txa was such a fun place to celebrate our birthdays! The food was good, and the Smoked Pork Pizza is to die for (incase you needed help in choosing from their menu  ) Ram was our attendant, he was lively and very helpful, to the point he helped me in speaking to their manager for my supposed voucher. Value for money is guaranteed!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Greetings Kobe, Thank you for your kind compliments. We are very pleased to know that you enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to serving you again soon! Kind regards, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Food is really good! The staff are amazing!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Cerila, Thank your for your kind compliments. We are very pleased to know that you enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to serving you again soon! Kind regards, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Came here with friends last Friday night and really thoroughly enjoyed ourselves! We were seated outdoors on the sofa area by the bar and the ambience was great. The bar outdoor bar was full but it wasnt noisy. Loved the fairy lights by the trees and nearby railings too! The food was great! Crowd fave were Sauteed Mushroom (theres truffle and egg!), Pintxos Platter, Churros, Chicken Wings and Curly Fries! The staff were attentive and was able to recommend great bottles of red wine! (Also, if you love Sangrias, this is the place for you!) Will be back here again because of their chill hang out space with good vibes!

service crew were really attentive to our needs & really professional. The food served is really unique , would highly recommend to patronise them once in a while if you would like to have a nice meal with your loved ones
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Cun Mun, Thank your for your kind compliments. We are very pleased to know that you enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to serving you again soon! Kind regards, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Good for drinks. Food was fine. Beautiful location.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Greetings Sophie, Thank you for your feedback. We hope you enjoyed your time with us and we hope to serve you again. Kind regards, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nice ambience and friendly staff, but service was slow and the food was hit-or-miss. Took a while for us to receive the menu and we waited an hour more for our food. Our drinks also came with most of the ice already melted. Although the staff said that our 2 drinks would be comped because of the slow service, we received the full bill anyway. We really wanted to like this place, but it was quite disappointing overall and regrettably a poor choice for dinner.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Sonya, Thank you for taking the time to share your honest feedback with us. We are saddened to hear that your recent visit was less than ideal and we sincerely apologise that we did not manage your dining experience to our usual food quality and service standards. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us and it is definitely our goal to improve and create better dining experiences for our guests We would greatly appreciate if you could contact us at enquiry@thealkaffmansion.sg to share your experience in detail so that we may investigate further and continue to improve for the future. Once again, we would like to express our sincere regret that we were unable to provide you the best possible experience at TXA and we truly hope to serve you better should you opt to dine with us again. Kind regards, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great service! Ram was really friendly and he gave us really amazing recommendations :) ambience was nice as well
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Amanda, Thank your for your kind compliments. We are very pleased to know that you enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to serving you again soon! Kind regards, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Regrettable choice, with extremely dissatisfying service, small selection of average quality food. Ive planned to attend the Semana Grande event and to catch up with a few friends and to celebrate one of my friends birthday last night but it was so bad I actually felt ashamed to have celebrated my friends birthday there last night. The service was terrible starting from the moment we sat down, as the compound was quite big we had no clue where our table was and the hostess told us to go look for our friends ourselves who were already in the courtyard. One seated no one came to welcome us, if anything I felt quite unwelcome already by then. Then, we had to desperately get the attention of our service staff whom we later found out was called Ram (While leaving we asked him for his name and actually was trying to hide his name and asked us if we were looking for his manager instead). We decided to take a start off our night with some beers and Ram came to take the order but actually sniggered at us when he left with our order of 3 half pints of beer. I mean that was just uncalled for, but I decided to let it pass since i thought i might have heard wrong but later on in the evening it just got worse each time we made subsequent orders of pintxos, mains and beers , he would leave shaking his head in disappointment as though we were not ordering enough. What made me decide to write this review was that after we have paid for our bill and asked Ram for a refill of our glasses of water, he told us alright but actually went to the open bar and signalled to his colleague to not fill our glasses up. A quick look at some of the recent reviews claims that Rams service was immaculate and perfect which i couldnt help but wonder if Ram is capable of such great service then why were we treated in such a manner that makes us feel like we were discriminated. The other service staff were also very disorganised and Im sure it had nothing to do with being short staffed as the courtyard was barely full. When we placed our orders with other staff they would get Ram to come and re-confirm our orders and yet they would serve us dishes which we did not order (which was later included in our bill). We also experienced extremely varied waiting times for our food and beverages, we could be served almost instantly or have to wait for upwards of 15 minutes for some dishes. It almost felt like we could not dine in peace, let alone celebrate our friends birthday. The saving grace was when we spoke to one of their event staff about how terrible the service was considering it was an event + our friends birthday she proposed to give us a small discount at the end of the night. The food was a hit and miss, the mains were alright but considering it is a pintxo bar, which I would believe is the main point of going there, the pintxo selection was ridiculously small with only 5 options available. Prices are on the high side for what its worth. Im guessing theres much work to be done for this establishment and until then I will not advise anyone to dine there nor dine there personally.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Yi Da, Thank you for taking the time to share your honest feedback with us. We are saddened to hear that your recent visit was less than ideal and we sincerely apologise that we did not manage your dining experience to our usual service standards. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us and it is definitely our goal to improve and create better dining experiences for our guests. Please rest assured that your comments have been forwarded to our management and we are currently in the process of investigating the issue with our team to prevent similar situations moving forward. Once again, we would like to express our sincere regret that we were unable to provide you the best possible experience at TXA and we truly hope that we will have another opportunity to serve you better should you opt to dine with us again. Kind regards, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Lovely location, great service. Ham croquetas were nice, the ham pintxo was ok. the downside: pimientos padrones were raw. Raw and bland. Not remotely authentic. The bacalao pintxo tasted like cardboard. The jamon one was tasty. Service, again, was very good.
excellent service and really good portions for the mains, celebrated my birthday here and they even gave us a complimentary slice of cake!! highly recommended :-)
Fantastic service by ram!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Greetings Alfred, Thank you for your kind feedback! We are glad that you enjoyed your time here with us and we look forward to hosting you again soon. Regards, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Food was borderline pedestrian and service was definitely lacking in all aspects. Messed up our food orders and food took ages to be ready. Waiter was surprised that we prefer not to use IKEA wine glasses for a $180 bottle of wine. None of the wait staff seem to really know their role or are just outright inattentive. Probably wouldnt be back to Alkaff TXA.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Khee Yeo, Thank you for reaching out to share your honest feedback. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us and it is our goal to continuously improve and provide the best dining experience possible to our guests. We are saddened to hear that your visit to TXA did not meet expectations this time around. While we indeed had an influx of customers this weekend leading to longer than usual wait times, it is no excuse that your service was compromised. We will certainly be taking this opportunity to investigate further among our team to avoid similar experiences moving forward. Once again, we would like to extend our sincere regret that we were unable to provide you the best possible experience at TXA. We truly hope to have the opportunity to provide you a better experience next time should you choose to dine with us again. Regards, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: 5 star for ambience, but 2 star for service. Waitors were polite and trying their best but didnt seem  well trained. Also felt short staffed. Food took forever to arrive. We been here twice and similar experience on both occasions. Its a gorgeous property and quality of food is decent but service needs an upgrade.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Moti, Thank you for reaching out to share your honest feedback. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance for us and it is our goal to continuously improve and provide the best dining experience possible to our guests. We are saddened to hear that your visit to TXA did not meet expectations this time around. While we indeed had an influx of customers this weekend leading to longer than usual wait times, it is no excuse that your service was compromised. We will certainly be taking this opportunity to investigate further among our team to avoid similar experiences moving forward. Once again, we would like to extend our sincere regret that we were unable to provide you the best possible experience at TXA. We truly hope to have the opportunity to provide you a better experience next time should you choose to dine with us again. Regards, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: The service is very good, Ram is the person that serving our table, he is very polite and patient, the dishes he recommended is delicious! Didnt get the Chef name but good job! We will definitely visit again! FYI, the view here is super nice at night!

detailed_reviews.review_text: First of all, the good points. Nice ambience. Friendly staffs. Nice desserts (burnt cheese cake). Point of not having more stars. Food is disappointing. Not sure if it s because of  mass produce  since this is restaurant week menu, the pintxos aren t fresh. Breads taste stale. Beef is  hard to bite . And the waiters while friendly, are unattentive. Eg bringing in the birthday cake while half of the table went to washroom, and unable to answer simple questions on the drinks. I think the servers are just overwhelmed. There are lots of room for improvement both food and service wise. Sadly for now, I don t think I ll recommend my friends nor revisit anytime soon.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear JJ, Thank you for reaching out to share your honest feedback. While we indeed had an influx of customers this weekend leading to longer than usual wait times, it is no excuse that your service was compromised. We will certainly be taking this opportunity to investigate further among our team to avoid similar experiences moving forward. Once again, we would like to extend our sincere regret that we were unable to provide you the best possible experience at TXA. We truly hope to have the opportunity to provide you a better experience next time should you choose to dine with us again. Regards, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: The worst dinner I ve ever had in Singapore fell on Valentines day. Our table was booked for 8:30 pm. We reached around 8:20 pm and saw numerous couples standing around, waiting for a seat like a hawker center. We waited for more than half an hour standing since the waiting area was packed, and there were not enough seats. Everyone had to try their best entertaining each other because it is a special day otherwise I would not be surprised if someone started a riot. It was obvious that the issue was the restaurant being severely understaffed. There was only one person at the counter and another running around, directing people to their seats. Very disorganized. There was no queue number or any sort of queue to begin with. People could only stand around and pray to all the gods that they would be called next because no one had any clue who came first. After observing the whole situation, we decided to stay near the counter instead of walking outside to avoid the crowd. Luckily, we were randomly asked to go in after 30 mins of wating. I wonder those poor souls who waited further away from the counter (understandably since it was very crowded) probably had to wait longer. The menu was a standard Valentines menu, we only had one choice to make - main course. But I guess they thought we needed half an hour to decide or nobody seemed to care if we had ordered or not. After awkwardly trying to get attention from multiple staff, someone finally decided to take our order. It took 30 mins for the appetiser to come. The portion was very small - it took us more time to instagram it than eat it. Saving grace is, it tasted decent. 10 mins later our cocktails came but from there everything went from bad to worse. Throughout the time in there, staff were constantly asking what did we order for main course. Not sure they trying to save the earth by not writing it down or what. There are only two freaking options for mains. That means, for each table, you only need to remember two dishes. Pretty sure zi char uncles and aunties can definitely do a better job than this, think they should be hired instead. 10:00 pm we were starving already so we were contemplating about ordering grab food but don t wanna be too disrespectful so we asked how long more. 4 - 5 mins, that was the answer. 10:15 pm we realised by now that our innocent souls got tricked. Such a stupid thing to do. If we ordered McDonald s we might have a better Valentines dinner by now. Never mind that 5 minutes later, another staff came in, we were expecting a good news but it turned out:  what main course did you order ah? . Seriously? At first I thought my dinner was tragedy but it was a comedy. It just became funny at this point. I started questioning about life and suffering. I heard life is nothing by false hope and liars, I guess that s true. 10:23 pm we finally got our main. TWO HOURS after we reached here. And we spent 2 mins finishing that miserable little steak jajajjajahahahhaha. 10:32 pm the dessert was unfashionably fast to be served judging from their standard. Probably their new record timing here. 10:40pm we left the place hungry and disappointed. Proceeded to my gf house for a maggi mee. That s probably the best thing that night. Thank you TXA for making me realised that true joy doesn t need to be as expensive as your dinner menu. Just one humble suggestion, if you don t have enough staff, please don t ruin people s special day by operating at this substandard. You don t need to pay me for this suggestion, because you probably paid it with your brand reputation.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Narudom, Thank you for reaching out to share your honest review. We would like to express our deepest apologies for your dining experience this past Valentine s Day. Regretfully, the heavy overbooking, extreme delays, and lapses in service are inexcusable from our end and we are sincerely saddened that your special celebrations were in turn compromised. We have emailed you directly to offer our sincerest apologies, and we hope that we may make reparations for your evening. Sincerely, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: I ve been to TXA Pintxo several times. It s normally fine, but I m not quite sure what happened during their 2020 Valentine s Day dinner. We made a reservation for 8:30pm, and showed up at 8:45pm and sat at around 8:50pm. From there, I felt like I had entered a parallel universe where everything that could go wrong did. The whole operation was amiss. The staff especially had no idea what was going on. We waited 1.5 hours to get our food, at which point we suddenly got all our courses at the same time. This is where I m adding 2 additional stars for the very nice bottle of wine they comped us, since at this point we were one of the last tables remaining and still hadn t gotten our food. But I m subtracting 1 because, in a turn of events, they chased us down as we were leaving to ask us to pay. I feel incredibly sorry for the significant others who went out of their way to book and prepay this 3 course dinner. And even more sorry for anyone on their first date. In sum, I would probably advise you to do your due diligence before coming and consider avoiding for special occasions.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Came here on Valentine s Day 2020 and was left extremely disappointed. The level of customer of service was appalling, if there was any at all. When I arrived at 6.15pm (seating was at 6pm), staff were still scrambling to place flowers on the table. Front desk staff asked us to proceed in but the service staff asked us to wait to be seated. It was clear that both teams were extremely unprepared. Next, a waiter came around asking how we would like our beef to be cooked (we had a choice between beef and fish). I was utterly shocked. Isn t the staff supposed to ask if we want fish or beef first? So rude and ill trained. Waited for more than an HOUR for the first course to arrive. Even then, the staff were extremely unsure on who they had already served and they comically tried to give the same table 2 servings. Embarrassing to say the least. Paid huge amounts of money for this dinner and it wasn t worth it at all. Drinks were bad, food was average, service was even worse. Will never come back ever again.

detailed_reviews.review_text: If only zero stars can be given. The only good thing about this place is the ambiance. The complimentary nachos and cheese are Latin American in origin, not Spanish. The Estrella beer keg must ve been old as it had gone sour. For some bizarre reason, despite hand picking the cold pinxto dishes buffet style, guests are not allowed to bring it back to the table with us, but instead entrust the sever to ferry it. Was it to add on plating garnish? No. There is simply no logical explanation for this process. Additionally, this adds an opportunity for mistake for the evidently inexperienced staff to bring it to another table while we, who had arrived earlier, sat at a table devoid of our both our drinks and food orders as well as plates and cutlery. The grilled dishes came out before the cold which were lukewarm and sans char/grill marks. The dishes were both saturated with sweetness, devoid of the acidity and freshness characteristic to Spanish food. The octopus, concurring with an earlier review, tasted like bakwa. Finally, 2 out of 4 of our cold pinxto arrived 45mins after we originally picked it out at the counter and they were certainly not worth the wait. A big ball of soft cheese on a piece of toast is unpleasant by all accounts. Out of patience, we asked for the bill and left, feeling disgruntled and cheated at paying $170 for such a horrendous dining experience. Although the staff repeatedly apologized for the delay in getting us the cold pinxto, with so many service errors, it s an empty gesture that felt almost insulting to clearly unhappy customers. Professional restaurants would send a manager to make amends and ask for feedback on how to improve. Instead, the staff timidly avoided our table unless directly beckoned. You can t get me to go back even if you paid me. Edit: Management response on valid bad Google reviews continue to follow a common trend: giving flimsy excuses without fully understanding the situation since they never bothered to get more information from the client and exhibiting a deflection of responsibility.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Tina, Thank you for reaching out to share your valued feedback. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us at TXA and weld like to assure you that your feedback is taken seriously. We are saddened to hear that your experience at TXA did not meet expectations. To clarify on your query regarding why Pintxos are taken to customers tables by our staff, this is so our staff are able to track the items taken. We apologize for the mix up in your order and for the cancellations as certain items ended up selling out by the end of the evening. We understand your frustration with the situation and wed like to assure you that we are taking the necessary steps to avoid such instances occurring in the future. Once again, wed like to express our apologies for your negative experience. Please do not hesitate to contact us at enquiry@thealkaffmansion.sg if we may be of any further assistance. Sincerely, TXA

And to make things worse they served tortilla chips with bottled nacho cheese as a free appetizer. This place is a disgrace to Spanish food.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nice atmosphere and location. Too bad the service was disappointing.  We wanted to have the digestion menu, but were told we had to sit at the bar for it.  As a group of 4 at the bar, we wouldnt be able to talk.  Staff didnt seem to understand that and couldnt accommodate us at our table because of how the dishes are plated and served.  Waiter was also pushing us to order while we decided if we should sit upstairs, at the bar or change plans.  We ended up leaving.  Can be a fantastic place with different staff
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Chris, Thank you for your feedback. Our intention for serving Pintxos Al Momento at the bar was to create a cosy and interactive experience with our chef to specially curate the pintxos for our guests. Hence, we highly recommend our guests to take up the pintxos al momento at the bar to facilitate easier communication and interaction as our Spanish Chef Marta will go through the ingredients and share the stories behind it for every dish. However, we take your suggestion into consideration and see how we can ensure that the experience for all our guests with different requirements and needs can be met. Regards, TXA
