detailed_reviews.review_text: Smoked pork collar seems to be microwaved. Inside of the meat was dry while the outer part tasted very much like bah Kwa. More effort and thought could have been put into the plating. With an almost 2cm thick pork collar, there was also servings of thick round fries, and purely butterhead with what seems like thousand island dressing, made the whole thing looks very unappetizing. The salad here was just solely huge butterhead leaves with dressing, and that was it. Disappointing. Pisco sour was also not consistent. Ordered the first one and it was good, and so we ordered a second one. This was absolutely disappointing because there was barely the taste of the liquor, but just simple syrup. Towards the end, can smell the bad smell of egg white. The only reason why I gave two stars was because this place was the place we had our wedding lunch years back.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Greetings Huiyun, Thank you for your feedback. To clarify, our smoked pork collar are slow cooked in our oven. Also, we ensure that all of our pork collar are served in the same size with the same dressing which are intended to complement and supplement the overall dish. We have also shared your comments on your drinks with the team and we are tightening the SOP to ensure that the drinks served are consistent. Once again, we apologise for your less than desirable experience at TXA Pintxo Bar. Sincerely, TXA
Greetings Nicholas, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed your time here at TXA Pintxo Bar and we look forward to hosting you again! Regards, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Honestly, the worst place I have eaten in Singapore this year. Which is quite a pity, because the venue is not bad. The food was so-so, but Im mainly taking off points because of the poor service (the management needs to take note of how severely understaffed they are, and buck up on training their servers who are not familiar with the menu at all). The price point isnt great either - we spent about $250 for three including a bottle of wine - but Ive had way better Spanish food elsewhere. We waited very long for the tapas too. They forgot our churros and to their credit, waived the charge for that. I believe it can be improved if they train their staff and improve operations, but with all these factors taken together, I wont be coming back unless something drastic happens.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Greetings Rachel, Thank you for your feedback. We pride ourselves in serving great pintxos and am disheartened to hear that it didnt meet your expectations. featured_reviews.review_text:
Very impressed by the food, service and overall vibes. Juliana was our service staff for the night and she was very friendly and helpful. We were there to celebrate my dad’s bday and the live band sang a birthday song to him - we loved it.

Must try dishes are the satay and ribs (that came w fries and corn) - they were *chef’s kiss*! This place is dog-friendly too so definitely a plus for me. My family had a very enjoyable experience and we will be back.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Ada, 

Thank you so much for your glowing review! We're thrilled to hear that you were impressed by the food, service, and overall vibes during your visit.

Juliana will be delighted to hear that she made your experience memorable with her friendly and helpful service. We're glad your dad's birthday celebration was made even more special with the live band singing to him!

It's fantastic to know that you enjoyed our satay and ribs – they're indeed chef's kiss-worthy! We're also pleased that our dog-friendly policy was a plus for you and your furry friend.

Thank you for choosing us to celebrate your dad's birthday, and we can't wait to welcome you and your family back for more enjoyable experiences!

Sincerely,
1918 Heritage Bar

featured_reviews.review_text: We came on a week night so there wasn’t many people, which felt great within such a beautiful lovely environment. But good ambience is nothing without good food and even better service. Our server, Raj, made us feel at home right away and recommended some amazing food. The chicken wings, Har Cheong chicken burger and the pulled pork pizza was amazing. 10/10 recommend
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Sky, 

Thank you for your fantastic review! We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed the lovely environment and appreciated the good ambience on your weeknight visit.

We're thrilled that Raj made you feel at home and provided excellent service throughout your dining experience. It's wonderful to know that his recommendations, including the chicken wings, Har Cheong chicken burger, and pulled pork pizza, were all amazing.

We truly appreciate your recommendation and hope to welcome you back for another memorable meal soon

Sincerely, 
1918 Heritage Bar

featured_reviews.review_text:
Hazelnut Coffee Wings ⭐️⭐️⭐️
The special hazelnut coffee wings were sweet and delicious, with a crispy exterior coated in coffee sauce and topped with crushed hazelnuts.

Seafood Fizzaa ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
This seafood pizza with large scallops was a delightful surprise, with flavorful cheese and a mouthwatering crust that melted in your mouth. A must-try for seafood lovers!

Truffle Carbonara ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Their signature dish, the truffle carbonara, had a rich truffle flavor and well-seasoned pasta that left us wanting to lick the plate clean.

The flavors at this restaurant are definitely worth returning for. Nice!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Angela,

Thank you for sharing your experience with us! We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed our Hazelnut Coffee Wings, Seafood Fizzaa, and Truffle Carbonara.

It's fantastic to know that each dish left a positive impression, from the sweet and delicious Hazelnut Coffee Wings to the delightful surprise of the Seafood Fizzaa and the rich flavor of our signature Truffle Carbonara.

We're thrilled that you found the flavors worth returning for, and we can't wait to welcome you back for another delightful dining experience!

Sincerely,
1918 Heritage Bar

featured_reviews.review_text:
I came for my very first time here on Lunar New Year’s Eve for an after dinner desserts and coffee. I ended up falling in love with this place and will definitely come back again.

To start off, the desserts lived up to my expectations. For you sweet tooth lovers out there, this is the perfect place for you. Got 4 different types of cake (Raspberry, Lemon Pound Cake, Pistachios & Carrot Cake) and their signature “You Tiao” which were their Pandan churros. Some might say it’s too sweet for their liking, but it’ll be a perfect option for sharing.

Additionally, their cocktails and coffee got us hooked. Versatile menu & a wide range of liquor to choose from. What makes them unique is their Signature Cocktails where you can find every bit of sweet, sour, salty and spicy to each their own.
I ordered a Garden’s Party, a sweet and refreshing drink consisting of Sprite, Gin and different variations of floral notes.

The HIGHLIGHT of the night were their live band happening every Friday night from 7.15pm onwards alllll the way till 10pm.
They set the tone and ambience for the night, an experienced band while engaging the audience. Kudos to them, they were my favourite thing of my night.

Will definitely come back here again, and recommend you to come here with your loved ones :)
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Phoebe, 

Thank you for sharing your 5-star review and the lovely compliments! Our team is thrilled that you had an amazing dining experience with us and we look forward to welcoming you back at 1918 Heritage Bar!

Sincerely,
1918 Heritage Bar

featured_reviews.review_text:
This is a hidden gem in Telok Blangah. Easier to drive over than taking public transport. Food is simply great with full of flavours. Try their grill octopus, grill half chicken. Both are very flavourful and tastefully seasoned. Price surprisingly is lower than I expected for such place and service. Their service is also top notched.

Their service staff keep ensuring us that there are preparing the outdoor seating for us so that we don’t waited too long. (It was raining and they are drying the seat for us). Yes it’s pet friendly too! I will defiantly come back for another visit.

Food: Great flavours
Service: Awesome (attentive)
Ambient: Great outdoor
Pet friendly: Yes
Price: Reasonable
Worth Second Visit: Yes
Worth Recommending: Yes
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:

detailed_reviews.review_text: The table allocation and system management were severely lacking. Despite reserving a table for two, we were given a small one that could barely accommodate our appetizers, let alone the main dishes of pizza, mac & cheese, and fries we ordered. We had to relocate to a larger table, which wasnt problematic, but the real issue arose when our food arrived over 40 minutes after ordering. This delay was due to the wifi being down, which prevented our order from reaching the kitchen. This issue went unnoticed until we observed neighboring tables receiving their orders promptly. Prior to this, we had already changed tables once due to space constraints caused by neighboring diners. Despite these challenges, Lu Fei from the staff was remarkably helpful and offered compensation for the inconvenience. Despite these hiccups, the food quality remained commendable, and the ambiance was delightful.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Jenni, Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We sincerely apologize for the challenges you experienced during your visit. We understand how frustrating it can be to have issues with table allocation and wait times, especially on a special dining occasion. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the small table and the delay in receiving your food due to the wifi issue. Were actively working to address these issues and improve our system management to ensure smoother service in the future. Were glad to hear that Lu Fei was remarkably helpful and offered compensation for the inconvenience. Providing excellent customer service is our priority, and we appreciate your recognition of Lu Feis efforts. Were pleased that despite these hiccups, you found the food quality commendable and the ambiance delightful. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a much-improved dining experience. Sincerely, 1918 Heritage Bar

detailed_reviews.review_text: I came for my very first time here on Lunar New Year s Eve for an after dinner desserts and coffee. I ended up falling in love with this place and will definitely come back again. To start off, the desserts lived up to my expectations. For you sweet tooth lovers out there, this is the perfect place for you. Got 4 different types of cake (Raspberry, Lemon Pound Cake, Pistachios & Carrot Cake) and their signature  You Tiao  which were their Pandan churros. Some might say it s too sweet for their liking, but it ll be a perfect option for sharing. Additionally, their cocktails and coffee got us hooked. Versatile menu & a wide range of liquor to choose from. What makes them unique is their Signature Cocktails where you can find every bit of sweet, sour, salty and spicy to each their own. I ordered a Garden s Party, a sweet and refreshing drink consisting of Sprite, Gin and different variations of floral notes. The HIGHLIGHT of the night were their live band happening every Friday night from 7.15pm onwards alllll the way till 10pm. They set the tone and ambience for the night, an experienced band while engaging the audience. Kudos to them, they were my favourite thing of my night. Will definitely come back here again, and recommend you to come here with your loved ones :) Parking: Limited number of slots. Wheelchair accessibility: However, do take note this is not an elderly friendly area, have to climb a flight of stairs and upslope to reach the place.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Had an anniversary dinner reservation on a Tuesday night @ 7pm, was served by Lu Fei, who was a wonderful and delightful host for our dinner. He very warmly welcomed us, patiently introduced to us to dishes and the history of the cocktails ($20 & $22) that we ve ordered, and also followed up with us after the meal. I ordered soft shell Chili crab pasta ($29) and Angus steak ($32). Crab was very flavorful, umami, and crispy; there was a generous amount of crab meat in the sauce. It also had the spicy kick that I enjoyed. The angus steak? Not so much. Overall flavor was ok but the meat was slightly tough. Didn t enjoy it at all. Initially I wondered what the fuss was about from other reviews about the service, and boy did they live up to expectations. Would prolly not patronize again, if not for Lu Fei. Thank you for making our experience so enjoyable.

detailed_reviews.review_text: The Alkaff Mansion is a really nice place to chill out especially when there is no rain. The food at 1918 Heritage Bar was good. We had the pulled pork pizza, curly fries and Har Jeong burger (a tad bit too salty for me). The indoor seating of the bar is a bit cold but the service staff Raj was nice enough to let us seat at a nice place that is not too cold. After the meal, we told Raj that it was the first time we were at the Alkaff Mansion and he showed us around and even explained some of the history of the place to us. Thank you for going the extra mile and the wonderful experience! Your company is lucky to have you. The place has nice and chill vibes, but isn t really accessible if you don t drive. Even with driving, climbing up the flight of stairs would require a great amount of effort for elderlies. This would be a place of consideration for events if there were lifts for elderlies.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Excellent service and REALLY good food, for its location. Big fan of the bak kwa pizza (its very rich, unique flavour even if youre not a fan of bak kwa) and the baked cauliflower is to die for. The hazelnut coffee chicken wing is very worth it too. This is for the dinner menu though, and very dog friendly as well!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Dono, Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We are delighted to know that you enjoyed your overall experience with us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon. Sincerely, 1918 Heritage Bar at The Alkaff Mansion

detailed_reviews.review_text: This was our second time visiting 1918 Heritage Bar to celebrate one of our birthdays. The waiter who served was delightful as the first time. We also got complimentary cocktails which were strawberry flavored (really delicious). We come here because of the food - one of the best Ive had in Singapore. The Peranakan appetizer was delicious, but the highlight was the truffle carbonara and Laksa prawn rolls. The carbonara was not heavy just perfectly creamy. The laksa rolls were a bit spicy but balanced with the mayo. Their cakes are really good quality! Recommend the pistachio pear cake and carrot cake.

We sincerely apologise for the lapses in our food quality and we regret that we did not meet your expectations this time around. We strive for regular improvement and we would greatly appreciate if you could contact us at enquiry@thealkaffmansion.sg to share your experience in detail. Once again, we would like to extend our sincere apologies and we truly hope to welcome you back again for a renewed experience. Sincerely, 1918 Heritage Bar at The Alkaff Mansion

detailed_reviews.review_text: On an exclusive location surrounded by lush green, you will find this cosy Restarunt with both fully air condition indoor and outdoor sitting. On a weekend, a 3 man live band plays recent pop ballads and some evergreens. Foods are delicious and you will not be disappointed even if you have high expectations. Place of food is good, finished plates are swapped with next order and we did not feel a time where we were waiting. Service is attentive and courteous. If you are looking for a nice night out to chill with good vibes, I recommend this place. Look for Alkalf Mansions then you will find 1918.

Not only is it pet-friendly, which is a rare find, their calamari and chili crab pasta were truly exceptional. The combination of crispy calamari and the flavorful pasta left my taste buds in awe. The ambiance and heritage charm of the place added to the overall enjoyment. A must-visit for pet lovers and food enthusiasts alike! Service staff are truly pet lovers as well which makes the whole evening even more enjoyable.

Atmosphere wise, the ambience is peaceful and retro but the aircond was way too cold. Please bring along a jacket if you want to stay for more than an hor.

detailed_reviews.review_text: We enjoyed the service and venue very much.  We had  the curly fries and calamari to start both were excellent.  We both had the Angus steak, unfortunately they were very different experiences, so not consistent. 1st steak was not hot and to salty for our taste 2nd steak was great, hot and not to salty compared to the first steak. Please note we hoth enjoyed the experience and will come back.  We want to provide useful feedback to help improve your restaurant and of course everyones taste is different so this is just my personal opinion.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Steven, Thank you for sharing your experience with us, and we appreciate your constructive feedback. Were delighted to hear that you enjoyed the service and the venue. Were glad that you found the curly fries and calamari to be excellent. However, we apologize for the inconsistency you experienced with the Angus steak. Your feedback about the first steak being too salty and not hot is valuable, and well use this information to ensure better consistency in the future. Were committed to providing the best dining experience possible, and your feedback helps us in our continuous efforts to improve. We appreciate your understanding that taste can vary from person to person, and were grateful that youre willing to provide feedback to help us enhance our offerings. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future for an even better experience. Thank you again for your visit, and we wish you all the best. We appreciate your understanding that taste can vary from person to person, and were grateful that youre willing to provide feedback to help us enhance our offerings. detailed_reviews.review_text: Our group of 9 celebrated 2 birthdays at TXA on a Saturday evening, and had the most wonderful time there. Loved the outdoor ambience; loved the attentive service; loved that there was a live band who performed excellently. We probably order 75% of the items on the food menu and all of them were good, no complaints at all food-wise. They have 1-for-1 (like-for-like) corkage policy, which I made use of to open a top drop. TXA gave us a complimentary piece of cheesecake for the celebration, with the live band singing the birthday song. It was a unforgettable evening. Highly recommended for anyone who wants to have a semi-casual and really fun celebration.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Raymond, Thank you for leaving us a 5-star rating, and for the compliments! Our team is delighted to know that you had a wonderful time with us, and we look forward to having you again at TXA. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: V nice ambience for dating

I was at the TXA restaurant for the World Malbec Day wine walkabout event. Based on the information on the sign-up page, there was supposed to be 18 exhibitors showcasing their wines from 6 - 9 pm. When I arrived, there were only 4 booths set up at 7 pm. This is a massive farce from your advertisement. Kindly refund me my money in full, if not you can prorate it based on the 4 booths that were set up. I have never attended a wine event where there is such a huge misrepresentation. Terrible experience.

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is a hidden gem in Telok Blangah. Easier to drive over than taking public transport. Food is simply great with full of flavours. Try their grill octopus, grill half chicken. Both are very flavourful and tastefully seasoned. Price surprisingly is lower than I expected for such place and service. Their service is also top notched. Their service staff keep ensuring us that there are preparing the outdoor seating for us so that we don t waited too long. (It was raining and they are drying the seat for us). Yes it s pet friendly too! I will defiantly come back for another visit. Food: Great flavours Service: Awesome (attentive) Ambient: Great outdoor Pet friendly: Yes Price: Reasonable Worth Second Visit: Yes Worth Recommending: Yes

detailed_reviews.review_text: Had rather high expectation of this place after my friend recommended me here. We orded the Angus steak, cheese cake and Iberico pork. The pork was really good and nice juice as well. However, the steak was really bad and dry. I asked for medium rare but came well done. Food was cold when it came! Literally cold steak and pork. Service was very slow but I saw that they have a ton of service crew?!?! The person who took my order ask if I want to have my dessert served later, but when I wanted to have the dessert, they told me i didnt order any. Probably will only come back and order a dri k for the ambience.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Joey, Thank you for taking the time to share your honest thoughts. Been wanting to try one of the restaurants at alkaff mansion and was not disappointed by the vibes. Relaxed alfresco dining surrounded by greenery, almost doesnt feel singapore. Mostly tapas style food, which i find average but aint bad. Used chope voucher for 10% discount

detailed_reviews.review_text: Avoid this restaurant unless you are super patient. Was here on a Saturday night. The food was coming out of kitchen really really slowly. After 45 minutes we were served 3 tapas we ordered. After 90 minutes the main course appeared. Other diners appeared to be waiting as well. Drinks were served quickly  but the kitchen did not seem able to cope.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear SP, Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us and it is our goal to continuously improve and provide the best dining experience possible to our guests. We sincerely apologise for the lapses in our service, rest assured that your feedback is taken seriously and has been addressed within our team for further improvements. Once again, we would like to extend our sincere apologies and we truly hope to welcome you back again in the near future for a renewed experience. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Good food and good live music. Loved the experience
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Jj, Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed your weekend and overall dining experience with us. Looking forward to welcoming you again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: If the weather is good, It s a great place to chill and enjoy the night! The tapas were all well done and the onglet steak tender! The foamed potato was a surprise and delicious. Churros weren t the best so may not have it again. Love the casual vibes and would come back up here with friends! They also gave a little cake for our anniversary :) despite being a little short on staff they were attentive and friendly when called. Thank you to Ram and the team!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Dion, Thank you for sharing your feedback! Our team is overjoyed to know that you had a lovely time with us, and we look forward to having you again at TXA. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: 2nd time at The Alkaff Mansion, but 1st time being here at night (TXA). Food was great. Thankful for the great weather and sitting outdoors was so chill and ambiance was lovely. Went there to celebrate my fathers birthday and staff prepared a slice of yummy red velvet cake that had a surprising peanut butter twist! The sparkling wine was great too, highly recommend it. My family had so much fun. Thank you, Ram, for the service! And also the other young Indian gentleman who was so conscientious about keeping our waters filled. We went on 12 Mar. P.s. the call button at each table is very helpful, all places should have them.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear J M A, Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We are thrilled to know that you and your family enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to welcoming you again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: The location is amazing, the food was quite nice, Id really give 5 stars but the service was appalling. Dishes arrived in random order one by one, a starter for example landed on our table more than an hour after weve ordered it. The dessert never arrived.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Dashenka, Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us here at The Alkaff Mansion. We strive for regular improvement and we would greatly appreciate if you could contact us at enquiry@thealkaffmansion.sg to share your experience in detail. This will facilitate staff improvement and help us to investigate the matter further. Sincerely, TXA Gastrobar at The Alkaff Mansion

detailed_reviews.review_text: Waited for over 45mins for our food cos the waitress forgot to send the order to the kitchen : ) apart from the underwhelming Spanish omelette which was supposedly popular, the food was generally okay. Honestly much prefer Wildseed s brunch menu (which is delicious!)

Ordered the roasted cauliflower, Spanish omelette, coca de anchovy and iberico pork. Roasted cauliflower can be more flavourful but it s still nice! Spanish omelettes made with potato filling which taste not bad. The coca de anchovy basically is like pizza but it taste nice. Iberico pork is the best of all, very flavourful pork with slight fats. Tried the burnt cheese cake which I feel it s normal. Overall a good experience dining there.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I am amazed how many restaurants there is in the Alkaff mansion. Not the first time I have been here; and I like the closeness to nature and the fact it s actually just 15 mins leisurely walk away from the closest bus stop (don t believe if its says its less than 10) Sit outside if the weather is not too hot and windy. On certain nights they have the BBQ option - we tasted a few BBQ dishes from the menu and it was pretty decent. If you have a group of friends, my tip is to get a few starters/ appetizers, get a few BBQ dishes and share them all. The beef angus steak is pretty good, the grilled peppers were my favorite and the grilled octopus was pretty fantastic! For the drinks, beside the beer - the Mexican-type sangria (sorry I forgot the name) is my favorite. Price is a bit on the high side - the grilled vegetable is quite a small portion with main dish prices.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Adrian, Thank you for taking the time to write us. Were glad that you had an enjoyable overall experience with us. We look forward to welcoming you back again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Alvin, Thank you for the kind feedback. Were delighted to know that you enjoyed your dinner with us. We look forward to having you dine with us again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: First time visiting this icon historic mansion cum restaurant. Spanish tapas bar with outdoor alfresco dining. Ambience and service is great. Food is tasty and mostly grilled food with cocktails. Only downside is the mildly wet chairs after the rain which makes the experience not fully enjoyed.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Sabrina, Thank you for taking the time to write us a review. Were delighted to know that you had an enjoyable overall experience with us. We look forward to hosting you again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great ambience, fantastic food, proactive and attentive staff!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Charming outdoor seating area, generally tasty food, but service SERIOUSLY lacking. Don t go here for a special occasion. Disappointed by the way they handled the  birthday  dessert, which was unbelievably inept (cast amongst the mess of a cluttered table by a bored youth, without a word or a candle). For the prices charged TXA IS not good value for money. It took a long time, and many reminders from hungry guests, for orders to arrive.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Viliah, Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us and it is our goal to continuously improve and provide the best dining experience possible to our guests. We sincerely apologise for the lapses in our service and we regret that we did not meet your expectations this time around.  We strive for regular improvement and we will be taking this time to train our staff. Please rest assured that your feedback is taken seriously and has been addressed within our team. Once again, we would like to extend our sincere apologies and we truly hope to welcome you back again in the near future for a renewed experience. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Thanks to the whole team, especially Ram and the bartender. They were very helpful, accommodating my special requests. The Pisco Sour and the Basque Cheesecake are must tries! We didnt have a full meal, but the other tapas we tried was delicious. Of course it also helps that the location is really gorgeous. Definitely worth a trip up the hill.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Tejas, We are thrilled to know that you had a great overall experience with us and that you particularly enjoyed our tapas, Pisco Sour and Tarta de Queso  La Vina  (Burnt Cheesecake). Looking forward to welcoming you back in a months time! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Unfortunately it was a very bad experience! I booked a special night for my husband s bday in the 9th May. we were impressed with the place, very beautiful.. but was about it. The service was horrible, they explained they were under staffed.. the food arrived cold, order fried croquettes that was def sitting there for loooong time before being served and no cutlery and plates. On my dish that had 3 components, came only with 2.. Was chaos! Only 2 tables were being well served, probably related to owner.. all the rest was very upset. They claimed to have a bday desert, that we never got. By end of dinner, we just wanted to leave this place! It s a pity, such a beautiful place and horrible experience.. regret scheduling a celebration there.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Nathalie, Thank you for reaching out to share your honest feedback with us. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us and it is our goal to continuously improve and provide the best experience possible to our guests. We sincerely apologise for the lapses in our service and food quality, and we regret that we did not meet your expectations this time around, resulting in a disappointing birthday celebration. While we did have an influx of customers this weekend, it is no excuse that your service was compromised. We will certainly be taking this opportunity to investigate further to avoid similar occurrences moving forward. Please rest assured that your feedback is taken seriously and has been addressed within our team. Once again, we would like to extend our sincere apologies and we truly hope to welcome you back again for a renewed experience. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Been here a few times, as I like the outdoor seating area and the ambiance. Food from the first time was always pretty mediocre, but still ok. However, it seems the service is getting progressively worse each time we visit. I booked yesterday for mothers Day. In the morning, they called to confirm the reservation, and I specified we wanted an outdoor table. That evening, after ordering, they suddenly told us that we had to move indoors due to a wedding. (Didnt they know about the wedding when they called me that morning?) Aside from that, they are VERY slow. It took 30 minutes and 3 reminders for my son to get a drink. Staff all seem to be confused and not know what they are doing. All in all, a very strange mothers Day experience. We ended up just having drinks and not bothering to stay for dinner at all.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Flame, Thank you for reaching out to share your honest feedback with us. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us and it is our goal to continuously improve and provide the best dining experience possible to our guests. It is great to hear that you have dined with us several times however, we deeply regret that we did not meet your expectations this time around and we sincerely apologise for the lapses in our service. While we did have an influx of customers and were understaffed this weekend, it is no excuse that your service was compromised. Additionally, we will be taking this opportunity to investigate the seating situation further to avoid similar occurrences moving forward. Please rest assured that your feedback is taken seriously and has been addressed within our team. Once again, we would like to extend our sincere apologies and we truly hope to welcome you back again. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Absolutely shocked at seeing how high the average ratings are - which goes to show that you cant trust averages. It was the most abysmal Restaurant Week (actually scratch that, any restaurant encounter) experience - and the fact that I chose it for one of my rare nights out with my SO drove me to write this even this has happened weeks ago! CONS 1) Servicing was almost non-existent: When we were seated, one of the lead waiters (?, Judging by the outfit) expected us to decide what to order from the e-menu mere minutes after being seated. We needed time and indicated so. It took us so long after go get the attention of anyone who would take our order. This was going to be a recurring pattern throughout the night - as we often had to ask and ask again to check where our drinks were (our order of a can of Coke took much longer to arrive than our appetizer), I think I also asked for my bill three times - the last time I just walked straight up to the front. The lead waiter that did take our order didnt really seem interested in making recommendations. Despite us ordering from the RW menu, he recommended the exact appetizer that was already in the RW menu. When I asked if they served ribs, he must have also forgotten that it was in the special menu until I saw it minutes after placing my order. The table next to us that was having a birthday party seemed to get more attention than us, so maybe we werent too interesting for the lead waiter? Who knows 2) Food was average to poor, for the price that was being charged. Forget about plating/ food presentation because there was no effort in that department. The place labels itself as a Spanish joint, but that was probably overstating: Everything was forgettable and mostly bland tasting, with the exception of the deep fried croquette balls and something else with Roquefort cheese (sorry, the experience was so bad I didnt even want to remember the details). The beef cheek was OK and the ribs were horribly bland. The dessert was forgettable. Cocktails were diluted and took forever (see comment above) to arrive. Perhaps it isnt fair to comment on presentation, but I was coming here with the mindset that it was part of RW. The appetizer, while delicious, was literally placed in a plate of lettuce and cheese that any kid could have done in 5 mins. PROS: The ambience. Long story short: Come for the ambience, but dont expect decent servicing or even decent food despite the prices that theyre charging.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear May, Thank you for taking the time to share your honest thoughts. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us and it is our goal to continuously improve and provide the best dining experience possible to our guests. While we are glad that you enjoyed the ambience, we sincerely apologise for the lapses in our service and food quality, and we regret that we did not meet your expectations this time around. We will certainly be taking this opportunity to investigate further to avoid similar occurrences moving forward. Please rest assured that your feedback is taken seriously and has been addressed within our team. Additionally, we have recently refreshed our menu offerings to include more tapas and al fresco live grills, and we truly hope to welcome you back again for a renewed experience. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Loved the ambience. Food and Drinks were awesome. The server Ameta was very patient and polite!! . Will visit again.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Prashant, Thank you for your kind review, we will be sure to pass on your compliments to Ameta. Looking forward to welcoming you back again soon! Do join us for the launch of our al fresco live grills on 23 April. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Excellent place, service and food
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Shrini, We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed your experience with us and we look forward to serving you again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very nice ambience. But contrary to other reviews, I thought food was pretty bad. We had small bites - calamari, fried carabinero prawns, croquettes and curly fries. Croquettes and fries were not bad. Calamari was terrible. Tiny slivers of squid hidden in thick greasy batter. Similar for the carabinero prawns. I d come back for drinks and perhaps other dishes but you re better off steering clear of the calamari and prawns. But setting was very pleasant and staff serving us was especially cheery.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear B, We are glad that you enjoyed your overall experience and we appreciate your honest comments about the Crispy Calamari and Deep Fried Carabinero Prawns. Please rest assured that we will convey your feedback to our kitchen team for improvement purposes. Nonetheless, we look forward to welcoming you back when our al fresco live grills debut on 23 April. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Was reading good reviews and hoping for better service when booking the place for birthday party. Unfortunately the service was  disappointing. 1. we have to ask for tap water each time and nobody was really watching if we need a refill. 2. Main course was delivered to people with 40 min difference. 3. Food was quite average. The place itself is nice and the garden is lovely. But sometimes needs to be done with the service.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Nat, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us and we sincerely apologise for your unpleasant experience and the lapses in our service. We were shorthanded on the day of your visit however we understand that it is of no excuse that your service was compromised. Please rest assured that we have conveyed your feedback to our team for improvement and training purposes. Once again, we would like to extend our sincere apologies and we truly hope to welcome you back again for a renewed experience. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Food, atmosphere and service was top notch. Was pouring heavily and stuck at the roadside under a parasol, then came a waitress who carried umbrellas down the stairs to pass it to us. Chicken wings was crisp, steak was tender and the truffle brie pizza was flavorful. Would recommend the truffle pizza over the burrata pizza as the latter didt taste out of the ordinary. Portion given was more than enough too. Ambiance was great and service was very attentive, did not even need to ask for a refill of water as the waiters and waitresses are faster than me. Will definitely be back here again.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Max, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We are glad that you enjoyed your time thoroughly with us and we look forward to welcoming you back again. TXA has now launched a new menu and we cant wait for you to try it! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Anouk, Thank you for your kind compliments! We are really glad that you enjoyed your dining experience with us and your feedback will be highly encouraging to Geri. Looking forward to welcoming you back again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ambience was great. Relatively quiet bar and beautiful lights. Service staff were friendly and approachable at all times.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Brian, We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed our ambience and service. Looking forward to welcoming you back again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: The venue is beautiful. We sat indoors and the vibe was just really relaxed and chilled. Good food, drinks and service. Would recommend their DIY Sangria. Tailor it to suit your taste- brilliant!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Ai Lin, We are glad that you enjoyed your overall experience, in particular our DIY Sangria Punch Bowl. Do visit us again to try out another customisable combination! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: I gave four stars because of the atmosphere and service. The outdoor dining environment is perfect for the cooler weather, and every waiter has a great attitude. In terms of food, I think its pretty average. The most special thing is the fried chicken wings, haha. I recommend everyone to order one. The first cocktail  is also very ordinary, so I don t recommend it here.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Cherry, Thank you for your lovely review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed the ambience and service. However, we would greatly appreciate if you could write to us at enquiry@thealkaffmansion.sg to let us know how we can improve on our cocktails. Looking forward to welcoming you back! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nice surroundings and great atmosphere. I love the chicken wings here and the food is not too bad. Geri was the one that served us and she was great! I will definitely return.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear RacJ, Thank you for your review. We are glad that you enjoyed your experience with us, particularly the Honey Paprika Chicken Wings. We will definitely pass on your compliments to Geri as well. Looking forward to welcoming you back! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nice ambience and great service by Geri & Peter
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Pei Wen, Thank you for sharing your feedback with lovely photos. We are delighted to know that you enjoyed your overall experience with us and we will certainly pass on your kind compliments to Geri and Peter. Looking forward to welcoming you back! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: The alfresco dining outlet is relatively new but quite accomplished in their service standards. The ambience is truly romantic, nestled just beside Alkaff Mansions, making for a great wedding reception venue too. Price is reasonable and the menu spread is compact & crisp. A must visit for couples & families.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Debapriya, Thank you for your lovely feedback! We look forward to welcoming you again with our March monthly specials and offerings. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: The ambience and the food and drinks were great, and great value - but want to especially compliment the staff on their service. Geri looked after our group through the evening and was great - super helpful, cheerful and provided consistently great service. We will be back!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Aniruddha, Thank you for leaving us a review. We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed your overall experience with us and we will certainly pass on your kind compliments to Geri. Looking forward to welcoming you back with our March offerings! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Perfect place for a laid back evening. Decent food  as well.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Kaihui, We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed your overall experience with us. Do drop by again soon for our Happy Hour offerings! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: We had a lovely evening at the outdoor seating area. The staff esp Geri were super enthusiastic and helpful with recommendations.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Clara, Thank you for your feedback, we are thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us on our al fresco terrace and we will certainly pass on your compliments to Geri. Looking forward to welcoming you back again really soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Served by Geri, very passionate and warm till the very last order! Great job! Warm ambience and windy place for chilling.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guoliang, Glad you enjoyed Geris service and your overall experience on our al fresco terrace. Looking forward to serving you again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great ambience, amazing service. Food tasted really good as well!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Marcus, We are glad that you enjoyed the ambience, service and food at TXA. Do drop by to try our exciting upcoming offerings soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Celebrated Valentines Day here. Ambience was great and service by Peter and Geri was exceptional. We thoroughly enjoyed the whole dining experience.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear DYPH, Thank you for leaving us a review. We are thrilled to know that you had a wonderful Valentines experience with us and we will pass on your kind compliments to Peter and Geri. Looking forward to serving you again. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: The place is quiet and nice. Suitable for 2pax or gathering with friends. Having outdoor and indoor seating. Very friendly staff. The food is good. Reasonable price. Do order they drink. Very nice. Will surely come back again.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Lynne, Glad that you enjoyed your overall experience with us. Do try our DIY Sangria Punch Bowl during your next visit. Looking forward to welcoming you back again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Alkaff Mansion is a beautiful place, with lovely staff. Had a delightful evening for the V Day package but the food was pretty meh, especially for the price of $148++. The I had the beef which the doneness was all over the place and the cod, which was terribly dry and did not match the description on the menu at all. In spite of that, their punch was delicious and I would enjoy that again, and the lighting and decor was spectacular. I wouldnt say it was disappointing as the staff really made us feel special.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Firdaus, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. While you enjoyed our service, ambience and Drunk in Love Punch Bowl, we would like to extend our sincere regret for the food quality. We will certainly be taking this opportunity to investigate further to avoid similar experiences moving forward. Please rest assured that your feedback is taken seriously and will be addressed within our team. Nonetheless, we look forward to welcoming you back again. Do drop by to try our DIY Sangria Punch Bowl soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Weve had a very nice evening here on Valentines day. Especially staff Geri was super friendly and attentive and ensured we have an enjoyable time. Food was very good and outdoor scenery is very nice. Special quiet place in Singapore   Thanks!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Achim, Thank you for leaving us a review. We are thrilled to know that you had an enjoyable overall experience with us and we certainly look forward to welcoming you back again for our upcoming offerings. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Food is underwhelming. Its a bit disappointing that Txa is selling themselves as a Pintxo restaurant but the Pintxo section is only a small subset of their whole menu (only 7 Pintxo items). I was expecting more. Its also a bit odd that they serve burgers, pasta and pizza (we didnt try these). I see the pdf menu file says Reduced - hopefully they can bring the original menu as intended. The restaurants vibe is a bit odd as well and it did not say Pintxos restaurant. Maybe im nitpicking but even the music is a bit out of place - party/club music. The bar in the middle of the restaurant was also out of place. I guess the intention was to have the spread of Pintxos on the bar but given COVID situation, its not really ideal to have it there. Service was ok. We didnt experience any delays on the food. It was just unfortunate that the servers dropped and broke a lot of things (e.g. plates, cups) that day.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Marvin, Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us and we truly apologise for your unpleasant experience. We would greatly appreciate if you could contact us at enquiry@thealkaffmansion.sg to share your experience in detail. This will facilitate staff improvement and help us to investigate the matter further. Kind regards, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great food with good service by Ram and other friendly staffs as well. Thanks for the anniversary surprise cake! Truly enjoyed the dinner. Will be back again!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Rebecca, Thank you for leaving us a review. We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed your time with us and Happy Anniversary once again! Looking forward to serving you again real soon. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: The ambience is very good. The restaurant is located in the heart of the greeneries. Ham croquettes and chicken wings were good. However, Im VERY disappointed with the angus steak. I ordered well done and the steak I got is still pinkish with blood on it. You can see the photo attached. Not to mention how rough the meat is. We couldnt chew and were not able to finish the plate (very rare for me). This is probably one of the worst steaks I had so far. For sure wont come back again.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Phitchaya Trakulchokchai, Thank you for sharing your feedback with us and for attaching photos. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us and while we are glad that you enjoyed our other food, we truly apologise for your unpleasant experience with the steak. For your preferred doneness, do reach out to our staff on the spot to send your steak back to the kitchen for additional cooking. We strive for regular improvement and we would greatly appreciate if you could contact us at enquiry@thealkaffmansion.sg to share your experience in detail. This will facilitate staff improvement and help us to investigate the matter further. Looking forward to welcoming you back should you opt to dine with us again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: We were served by Allaine. Perfect place for a dinner, outdoor alfresco dining. Food is yummy, ambience is great, service is excellent and reasonable pricing   they even prepared a complimentary cake for our anniversary! would highly recommend!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Neo Wei, Great to hear that you had a superb overall experience with us! We will definitely pass on your kind compliments to Allaine and we hope to welcome you back again for Valentines! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: My party of 7 could not have asked for a better server than sweet and attentive Geri who went all the way out to take perfect shots for us. It was indeed a night to remember with the great ambience and food.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Jasmine, We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your overall experience and we will certainly let Geri know of your kind compliments. Do drop by again soon for Happy Hour! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: We had a very enjoyable time at TXA Gastrobar tonight. We were served by Allaine and Geri. Service was impeccable and we would like to specially mention that Geri was really attentive and sincere in her service. Ambience was great with delicious food served promptly. Will certainly visit again. Thank you for the amazing evening! What a great way to kickstart the weekend!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Sarah, Thank you for your amazing feedback. We will be sure to pass on your kind compliments to Allaine and Geri. Looking forward to welcoming you again soon, do come by to try our February monthly specials and Happy Hour! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Happy place! Good music and decent food. And excellent service from staff :)
The food,service and ambience was amazing! Shout out to Ram and Geri for the outstanding service! It has made out anniversary a wonderful one!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Kenneth, Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled that you had a great time with us and we will definitely pass on your kind compliments to Ram and Geri. Looking forward to serving you again, do drop by for our upcoming Valentines set dinner! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Homely food on a hit & miss chance of being OKish. Service below minimum. Ask me whether I want another glass, chances are near 100% I will say yes. Here you beg for the waiters to bring your opening order.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Kai, Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us and we truly apologise for your unpleasant experience. We strive for regular improvement and we would greatly appreciate if you could contact us at enquiry@thealkaffmansion.sg to share your experience in detail. This will facilitate staff improvement and help us to investigate the matter further. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Was sitting outdoor and the ambience is great! Food and drinks are nice and affordable, and mostly important the service was excellent! Highly recommended for chilling out with friends or a romantic night with loved one. Tried Wildseed for brunch, TXA for dinner.. and cant wait to try out UNA next!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Cindy, Thank you for your kind feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back again and feel free to dine at our sister concept, UNA, soon as well. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Fantastic service. Was seated at the alfresco area but it started pouring. We were given new seats and was asked if we wanted fresh plates. Great service by Ram and rest of the staff!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Rusty, Thank you for your kind feedback. We will pass on your compliments to Ram and the team. Looking forward to welcoming you back again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: We hiked here to have dinner from Kent Ridge Park. The ambience is really great with nice music. The staffs are friendly and attempted to our needs readily. We were thrilled that happy hours is till 9pm Monday to Thursday. We ordered the monthly special Spanish omelette, 2 mains - Vongole pasta & Grill octopus, Burnt cheese cake and drinks. We are satisfied with all our orders and plan to patronise again with more people next week.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Jia Xing, We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed our food, ambience and service entirely. Do drop by to try more of our monthly specials. Looking forward to welcoming you and more friends back again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: My boyfriend suggested this place for my birthday celebration and it was so lovely!! It was really quiet and empty (as it was a weekday) so we nearly had the whole place to ourselves. The service especially was excellent - special thanks to Geri who was really enthusiastic and helpful. The staff also gave me a complimentary birthday cake (which was delicious). 10/10 would recommend! Thank you txa for making my birthday so memorable! :-)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Leah, Happy Birthday once again! Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We are glad to know that you had a fabulous celebration with us. Do come by again to try our monthly specials and Happy Hour offerings soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great cosy area that is perfect for a night out with your loved ones. The lights and ambience sets the perfect mood for any night. Food and drinks are great. I would like to give a special shout out to Ram who catered to us on our special night out. I would definitely recommend this place to my friends and would consider coming back again!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Mala, Great to hear that you enjoyed yourself thoroughly during your recent visit. We will be sure to pass on your kind compliments to Ram, looking forward to welcoming you back! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: The place is nice and cozy     . Thank you RAM for good service
Thanks RAM!!!! VERY VERY GOOD SERVICE!!!!

Had a wonderful dinner yesterday where I brought my girlfriend our for her birthday date. The ambience was extremely scenic and it was highly romantic. Food was also really delicious I particularly enjoyed the truffle duck pasta and La casa grande. The service was the real highlight of the evening, really enjoyed the hospitable service provided by the two young staff that mainly attended to us, unfortunately I only could get the name of one of them, Geri. She was really attentive and highly energetic, it made me feel like she genuinely enjoyed her work and I felt very comfortable. The manager also provided us with a free cheesecake for my girlfriend s birthday and that was greatly appreciated. Would definitely come again!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Matt, Great to hear that you and your girlfriend had a pleasant experience and particularly enjoyed the Smoked Duck Truffle Carbonara Pasta and La Casa Grande cocktail. We will also be sure to pass on your kind compliments to Geri and the team. Do visit us again to try our monthly specials and more! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love the atmosphere. Open air, big space and it helps that the weather is fantastic . Geri gave us amazing service. Her attitude is 2nd to none. Look for Geri if you come.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Kenneth, We are glad to know that you enjoyed your time with us and we will definitely pass on your compliments to Geri. Looking forward to serving you again soon. Do drop by to try our monthly specials! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: We were here for hubbys birthday celebrations. Service from RAM is great and helpful. Friendly and cheerful at all times. Food is great too. Though the lobster was slightly undone, the rest of the food are delicious.  Will be coming again soon.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Lena, We are thrilled to know that you had a fantastic time with us and we will definitely pass on your compliments to Ram. Looking forward to welcoming you back again really soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Service was great, ambience was nice and the staffs gave genuine recommendations on what food to try as it was our first time there. They even treated our friend to some shots and a slice of burnt cheesecake as it was our friend s birthday and also sang birthday song along with us. Would definitely recommend this place for a good casual dinner sesh.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Stephanie, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are thrilled to know that you had an enjoyable experience with us and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Comfy place to chill and dine!
lovely ambience, good food and service. reasonable prices. enjoyed the time there.

Our family had a lovely Christmas Eve dinner. Great food, nice ambience and excellent service. The night was made even more memorable as we were served by friendly Ken who went the extra mile to take beautiful family photos for us and even surprised with a slice of cheese cake!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear John, We are thrilled to know that you had a great Christmas Eve dinner with us and we will be sure to pass on your compliments to Ken. Looking forward to having you dine with us again! Cheers, John

detailed_reviews.review_text: Good food and nice place at this place! Very friendly staff as well. Ram was very nice to check in on us with our food and even gave my friends that got engaged cakes to celebrate ! Allaine was also very awesome in her service. Great staff great place.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Jonathan, Thank you for your compliments. It was a pleasure to serve your table and we look forward to welcoming you all back again soon. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Good ambience and servers, especially Ram, were very professional and fast. Food was served promptly and piping hot.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Kutsu, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your overall experience with us and we will be sure to let Ram know of your compliments. Do drop by for our Happy Hour promotion and upcoming NYE offerings! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very nice ambience. The food is good. I love the squid where it preserved the bake seafood taste and smell. The staff are friendly. I even had my complimentary cheese cake. Recommended.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear GOH, Thank you for your feedback. It is great to know that you thoroughly enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Peter the manager was really nice and the entire experience was superb! Steak and Calamari are must-orders. Would totally come back again
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Jasmine, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are glad to know that you had a pleasant overall experience with us and we will be sure to pass on your compliments to Peter. Looking forward to welcoming you back soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Lovely ambience, the colonial era mansion is very atmospheric. Loved the service, from the petite lady in black polo tee who served us food inside to the Malay gentleman in maroon shirt and Indian gentleman in black polo tee who served us drinks. They were attentive and friendly. The food was good. We had the smoked duck truffle carbonara pasta and angus onglet steak. The dishes were reasonably priced, considering the overall ambience of the place. The outdoor area makes for the perfect spot to chill over some drinks and empty banter.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mahathir, We are glad that you had a great overall experience and particularly enjoyed the Smoked Duck Truffle Carbonara and Angus Onglet Steak. Looking forward to welcoming you back again soon for Christmas! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very cosy place, great ambience! The staffs are very friendly and professionals. Kudos to Elaine!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Rhea, Thank you for your feedback. We will be sure to pass on your compliments to Elaine. Looking forward to welcoming you back soon, with our festive offerings! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Disappointing experience at TXA gastrobar dinner service. We had some questions about the food items on the menu while we were ordering. The waiter attending to us mentioned he is from the restaurant UNA upstairs and he was just helping out at TXA. He claimed doesn t know the menu at TXA hence he was unable to answer our queries. We were hoping he would direct his colleague who knows the menu to us but all we got was a blank stare and an awkward silence. So awkward that we decided not to pursue it, give the benefit of the doubt and just order the food. (Food turned out so so, average) The food we ordered was meant for sharing and every time a stack of plates with cutlery were placed on our table. Not once did any staff took the initiative to lay the plates and cutlery out for us, it was always just a stack laid out at the corner of the table. The table was very unstable as well. It is hard to enjoy a meal while trying to balance the table and hope nothing falls off. Unless the management works on staff training and investing in sturdier dining tables for patrons, not worth a visit there.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Bryan, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us and we greatly value your honest feedback. As our staff were engaged with other tables, a staff member from UNA s team noticed your table and attended to you in the meantime. We sincerely apologise that he was not able to provide menu recommendations due to his designation at UNA. Additionally, we hope that your dining experience was made a little better after our staff replaced the shaky table. Please rest assured that we have conveyed your feedback to our team and once again, we would like to extend our sincere regret that we were unable to provide you the best possible experience at TXA. We truly hope to have the opportunity to provide you a better experience next time should you choose to dine with us again. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Me and my friend chance upon the Alkaff Mansion on our walk. We ordered pasta, steak   curly fries   churros and orange juice. The food was great, the staff were very attentive and easy going, the atmosphere was relax.  The place itself was magical, a private place where you can chillax. It s a good place to have drinks and eat and just be cool  . We will come back with more friends and family. Meow!!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Lucy, Thank you for your kind compliments. We are pleased to know that you enjoyed the food, ambience and service. Looking forward to welcoming you back again soon with our upcoming festive offerings! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great exp. We did our 10th Anniversary dinner and drinks. Service and food both Amazing
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Soumik, Thank you for your kind compliments. It was our pleasure to serve you and we look forward to welcoming you back again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Excellent food and service :) loved the vibe there~
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Yiying, Thank you for your kind compliments. Looking forward to welcoming you back again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great service, great staff, good ambiance and good music. Who could have ask for a more perfect place to chill and relax.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Benny, Thank you for your compliments. We are thrilled to read that you thoroughly enjoyed yourself and we look forward to having you back again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nice, chill spot for some casual tapas. Excellent service.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Kelly, Thank you for your feedback. We are delighted to know that you had a lovely experience with us, looking forward to welcoming you back again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: The smoked duck carbonara pasta and honey wings were really good! Ram s service was really good and he attended to us very fast even though we were seated at a secluded area!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Junting, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We are really encouraged by your pleasant overall experience and happy to know that you particularly enjoyed the Smoked Duck Truffle Carbonara Pasta and Honey Paprika Wings. Looking forward to welcoming you back again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: My hubby bought me here to celebrate our wedding anniversary. Nice atmosphere and cosy place. Perfect for relax romantic dinner set all the good mood. Food is delicious. The staff are all extremely professional and friendly. We were about to leave after the bill when the staff comes with complementary cheese cake with candle wish us happy anniversary. So Touch! Special Thanks to Ken, he is super nice and friendly. Knowing is our anniversary, he even put so much effort help us take a few nice photos around the mansions. Thumbs up to Ken! We will definitely come back again soon and recommend this place to our friends!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Yuliana, Thank you for your kind feedback. It is our pleasure to serve you on such a joyous occasion! We are glad that you enjoyed your overall experience and we will definitely pass on your compliments to Ken. Looking forward to welcoming you back soon, do drop by to try our DIY sangria punch bowl with your husband and friends! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Beautiful ambience and great service!
5-star service and food in TXA. Went to celebrate a friend s birthday and we enjoyed the great service and food. Would recommend to others.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear David, Thank you for your generous rating and compliments. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your experience with us. Do drop by for Happy Hour, looking forward to serving you again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Came here for a birthday dinner and was served by the waiter ram , he was really professional and also had a sense of humour and he even sang a birthday song for me.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Bryan, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your experience and we will definitely pass your compliments to Ram. Looking forward to serving you again soon and happy birthday to you once again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Enjoyed the chill ambience and the food was well done - especially loved the fried Pradon peppers, ham croquettes and vongole aglio olio (al dente and so tasty). Service was quick and earnest - in particular, Ken was attentive throughout without being intrusive. Will return
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Catherine, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed the food and your overall experience with us. We will be sure to pass on your compliments to Ken too. Do drop by again soon for Happy Hour or our upcoming Weekend on Fire live bbq! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: I went Txa Pinto Bar on Saturday for the Halloween Theme Dinner and it was definitely a brilliant idea! Everything there was on point! Amazing ambiance, the food and drinks were quality and the service by the staffs were excellent! Special shout-out to the bartender for the Halloween cocktail because it was one of the best cocktail I ve had so can consider putting it in the regular menu hahah.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Khaeruddin Amat, Thank you for your kind feedback, were happy to know that you enjoyed your time with us and well be sure to share your compliments with our staff. Do drop by to chill out with us and try our all-new customisable DIY sangria punch bowl. Looking forward to serving you again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great place to chill and enjoy the beautiful British colonial mansion during the Halloween night. Excellent service and great choices of drinks in the manu. We would definitely come back again.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Stephie, Thank you for your kind feedback, were happy to know that you enjoyed your time with us and well be sure to share your compliments with our staff. Do drop by to chill out with us and try our all-new customisable DIY sangria punch bowl. Looking forward to serving you again soon! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Had a wonderful birthday dinner here. Food was great and loved the service from Ram. Would definitely come again!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Yun Sheng, Thank you for your kind feedback, wed be sure to share your compliments with Ram. Looking forward to serving you again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Excellent service and atmosphere! Ram elevated our dining experience by his warm service :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Dillon, Thank you for your kind feedback, wed be sure to share your compliments with Ram. Looking forward to serving you again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Service was great (served by Ram)! Food was amazing. Overall had an amazing dinner.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Draco, Thank you for your kind feedback, wed be sure to share your compliments with Ram. Looking forward to serving you again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is truly a gem in Singapore. Was here with family  on Sunday. Drinks - All of us had preferences on our drinks and the bartenders personally attended to us and made excellent drinks. The 2 cocktails I had here were better than some of the best cocktail bars in Singapore. Food - We had the Chicken wings , Mushroom Croquettes and Truffle pizza. All dishes were great. Service - 10/10 for service. Right from when we arrived to the time we left we felt fully taken care of. Ambience is the best highlight. This is also a pet friendly place and my puppy loved being here. Will come by again. Thanks for a great evening.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Ms Maya, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your experience with us and we are so heartened to hear that the cocktails you had surpassed some of the best bars! We look forward to serving you and your fur kid again soon. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nice chill out place with friends during the night! They have Fridays on fire live bbq menu! Try it!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Edwin, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your experience with us. Do drop by for our Happy Hour offerings every Tuesdays to Thursdays and we look forward to serving you at our Fridays on Fire bbq again! Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Good food, great service by Fhil.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Suthen, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your experience with us. Will extend the compliments to Fhil too! Looking forward to serving you again soon. Do drop by for our Happy Hour offerings every Tuesdays to Thursdays. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Food is okayish, but comes in large portion. Ambience is good too.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Credible Blogger, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your experience with us. Looking forward to serving you again soon! Do drop by for our Happy Hour offerings every Tuesdays to Thursdays. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: We were there on a Saturday evening to celebrate my husband birthday. The atmosphere was really good, nice music in the background, temperature was just right even for outdoor, with a little breeze now and then. We had a few tapas and bar snacks to start with. Love the presentation of each dish. Honey paprika wings were the unexpected highlight!! Full of umami flavors from roasted sesame & seaweed. Finger licking good We were also impressed by the beef short rib dish, having literally melt-in-your-mouth kind of texture, going so well with the dipping sauce on the side. I would recommend to go with truffle mushroom for the pizza, forget the prawn & scallop as it was quite bland.. at least the truffle cream was satisfying with every bite. Overall, a very nice & cosy place for family & friends gathering, even a romantic date would be appropriate. Price wise, not cheap but reasonable I would say! Not forgetting to mention, their service crews were really well trained. Thumbs up.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Jeanna, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your experience with us and you really enjoyed the food, ambience, and music. Looking forward to serving you again soon! Do drop by for our Happy Hour promotions every Tuesdays to Thursdays. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Service was really slow at the start - we had to wait for almost 30 minutes each (at least, that was how long it felt) for the menu, some ice water, and they got our orders wrong a couple of times too. It felt like the floor crew did not communicate with one another. Food was first served without any cutleries as well. But the food was delicious so it made up for the lack in service. Then Ram (I hope I got his name right) started serving us and he completely changed the service game thereon. He was attentive, friendly, and patient. If it was not for him, we would not have left the place feeling like we had a good time. Thanks Ram!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Herman, Thank you for your feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed the food and awesome service from Ram. Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us and we will look into improving our processes. Looking forward to serving you again soon! Do drop by for our Happy Hour promotions every Tuesdays to Thursdays. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Food was awesome. Service was top-notch. Ram was really helpful and attentive! Recommended!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Jeanna, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your experience with us and will extend the compliments to Ram. Looking forward to serving you again soon! Do drop by for our Happy Hour promotions every Tuesdays to Thursdays. Cheers, TXA

detailed_reviews.review_text: Stunning location, one of the prettiest outdoors restaurants I have seen, in a lush park and on the side of the Alkaff Mansion building that TXA and a few other venues are part of, which is a really pretty building. Great ambiance too, due to nicely set up lighting. Food was very good although in itself nothing to rave about. Good selection of pintxos and other small dishes as well as bigger mains. Nicely done and presented. Staff nice, attentive and flexible. Was sometimes hard to grab their attention as the space is quite big and we were sat at the end of the terrace, which meant that we had to keep trying, but when they did see us they were great.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Nikos, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your experience with us. Looking forward to serving you again soon! Do drop by for our Happy Hour offerings every Tuesday to Thursday. Cheers, TXA

Dropped by on a Friday night to have a chill session with my partner. Despite it being full , we were able to get a table after about 10mins of wait. Ordered the chili crab pasta and smoked pork pizza together with some cocktails and everything tasted good! We were well taken care of by 2 of their staff ( ken and ram)! The outdoor area was a good place to sit and chill . Would definitely make a trip down again !
